563231470431674.description:
De plek waar Blur, The Libertines en The Kooks begonnen. Komende editie op vrijdag 9 en zaterdag 10 mei in Paradiso.

In 2014 gaat London Calling alweer zijn 22e jaargang in. Het festival dat in Paradiso wordt georganiseerd biedt een plek voor nieuw en opkomend talent uit Engeland, Amerika en ver daarbuiten. Op de voorgaande edities boekten niemand minder dan Blur, Placebo, The Libertines, The Kooks, Bloc Party hun eerste successen. In 2013 waren onder meer Jagwar Ma, MS MR, London Grammar, Palma Violets en Unknown Mortal Orchestra te gast op het halfjaarlijkse festival.

------------------
BEVESTIGD

Vrijdag 9 mei: 

Jungle - Wolf Alice - Menace Beach –  The Proper Ornaments - Folly and the Hunter – Hospitality – Teleman  - Happyness - The John Steel Singers

Zaterdag 10 mei:

 Royal Blood - Arthur Beatrice - Wild Cub - Ryan Keen – Gambles –Telegram - Desperate Journalist – Childhood – Bohicas - Public Access T.V. – Solids - The Delta Riggs - The Neighbourhood - The Fat White Family

------------------
Desperate Journalist uit Londen heeft misschien nog geen langspeler uit, maar de vier nummers die online zijn uitgebracht werden wel meteen opgemerkt door de Britse en Amerikaanse muziekblogs. Spannende post-punk met pittige vrouwelijke vocalen, denk Siouxsie and the Banshees, Savages, Bleached. Overtuigend, krachtig en live ongetwijfeld een sensatie.

Wolf Alice was dé Britse hype van 2013. Geen blog dat er niet over schreef. Het Nederlands livedebuut beleefde Wolf Alice op London Calling in de Tolhuistuin, waar de reacties lovend waren.De muziek van Wolf Alice is sprankelend, spannend en gruizig. Ergens tussen het fluisterwerk van Mazzy Star en de lo-fi klanken van Pavement en The Fall in. 

Arthur Beatrice uit Londen maakt mysterieuze, minimale popmuziek – een beetje zoals The xx, maar meer indie dan electronisch – en ze staan op het punt om internationaal door te breken. De band heeft een frontman en frontvrouw: Orlando Leopard en de sierlijke Ella Girardot. De ritmesectie wordt bezet door de broers Elliot en Hamish Barnes.

Elliott Hammond, toetsenist van Wolfmother, is de frontman van The Delta Riggs. Deze band uit Sydney maakt pure rock ’n roll, met invloeden uit 70’s psychedelica en hardrock. Het nummer ‘Hex.Lover.Killer.’ is een heerlijk aanstekelijk rock ’n roll anthem voor fans van Wolfmother, Jet, Cage The Elephant, The Hives.

Ice Choir. Pet Shop Boys, Erasure, Spandau Ballet,  Visage, Johnny Hates Jazz, Tears for Fears en dat dan door de drummer van Pains Of Being Pure At Heart dan heb je Ice Choir. Het project van Kurt Feldman -want zo heet hij  - is een ode aan de jaren  tachtig. Gladde Synths, barokke vocalen, romantische teksten en een hitsige drumbeat. 

De muziek van Proper Ornaments is te omschrijven als perfecte indiepopmuziek, minimalistisch en klassiek, aanstekelijk en tijdloos. The Velvet Underground en Jesus & Mary Chain, maar dan iets meer gepolijst en moderner, zoals ook Jacco Gardner dat aanpakt. Proper Ornaments tourde in 2013 met Crystal Stilts en is op dit moment bezig met het eerste studioalbum. 

Amber Papini is de spil van de New Yorkse indieband Hospitality. Ze is een eigenaardige zangeres en songschrijver met een typisch Brits accent, maar dan met een Texaans tintje en haar liedjes getuigen van een enorme muzikale verbeeldingskracht. Tegendraadse indie. Vrolijk met een scherp toontje. Ze zou zo het derde zusje van Kim en Kelley Deal kunnen zijn. Het debuutalbum ‘Trouble’ komt zeer binnenkort uit.

Gambles is Matthew Daniel Siskin uit New York: hij maakt prachtige, ontroerende folkpopliedjes die veel gevoelens, emoties en tragedies verbergen. Op zijn debuutalbum ‘Trust’ is hij te horen als kalme zanger met akoestische gitaar. Hij laat zich niet omschrijven als eenzame troubadour, maar als getalenteerde folkzanger die zijn verhalen wil vertellen, en waar we nog veel van gaan horen.

San Fermin laat wervelende orkestrale chamberpop met allerlei stemmen en arrangementen op een natuurlijke manier samenkomen. De band werd opgericht in Brooklyn, door Ellis Ludwig-Leone. Na zijn studie aan Yale University raakte ze bevriend met Nico Muhly (Sufjan Stevens, Grizzly Bear) met wie hij zijn eerste composities schreef. Pas in 2013 werd het eerste werk onder de naam San Fermin uitgebracht: het debuutalbum ‘San Fermin’ werd met maar liefst 22 muzikanten opgenomen en is een sterke kennismaking met de band. 

Menace Beach is een ware indiesupergroep, bestaande uit o.a. Matt Johnson van Hookworms, Rob Lee van Pulled Apart By Horses, Nestor Matthews van Sky Larkin, Paul Draper van Mansun en Matt Spalding van You Animals. Menace Beach brengt allerlei alternatieve stijlen samen in zijn muziek: 90’s grunge, Madchester Britpop, shoegaze, en fuzzy noiserock. Een krachtig en opwindend geheel, voortgebracht door enkele grootheden uit de hedendaagse indiescene.

Als een ruimtemannetje zou vragen hoe ziet een indieband eruit? Dan kun je het beste een foto van de Britse band Telegram laten zien. En ook de muziek zou een perfecte inleiding zijn in het genre. Licht psychedelische gitaren, achternagezeten drums, bezwerende zang en verslavende refreinen. Zelf noemt de band het bootgaze. “Lots of people try and call it psych-rock or shoegaze, but… I mean, we just wear boots – bootgaze!”. 

Childhood is een band uit London die hypnotiserende pop maakt en op het punt van doorbreken staat. Zomers, catchy, maar met een goed scherp randje. NME is groot fan en schrijft: “A pinch of Creation Records shoegaze, a fistful of Sarah Records jangle, some baggy swagger and the right mix of laconic dreaminess and croon-along hooks”. 

Solids is een Canadees duo dat met veel enthousiasme rockmuziek maakt, geïnspireerd door Dinosaur Jr., Sonic Youth en Superchunk. Oftewel: melodieuze grungerock met een flinke laag aan distortion en feedback effecten. ‘Blame Confusion’ is het debuutalbum dat afgelopen oktober werd uitgebracht bij Fat Possum Records (The Black Keys, Iggy and the Stooges).

Jungle is een Brits duo dat vorig jaar doorbrak met de single ‘Platoon’. De ongooglebare band schopte het met dit lied tot de BBC Sound Of 2014 lijst en sindsdien gaat het razendsnel met deze hype. Noem het indiefunk, urban tribal, wereldsoul: het is in ieder geval fris , hip, swingend en verslavend.

Royal Blood klinkt als een grote gitaarrockband maar is een hip duo zonder gitaar. Onvoorstelbaar  maar waar. Zanger-bassist Mike Kerr en drummer Ben Thatcher uit Brighton zorgen samen voor dit kunststukje. Bikkelhard, onverwoestbaar, met een muur van geluid en zonder enige concessie overstuurde de band reeds twee singles de wereld in die beiden insloegen als een bom. 

“New York’s Hottest New Band”, aldus NME: Public Access T.V. heeft met de single ‘Monaco’ de hype flink aangewakkerd. De band maakt springerige, strakke indierock die direct doet denken aan The Strokes. Afgelopen januari speelde zij pas de allereerste show; vers van de pers dus. Veel is er over Public Acces TV nog niet bekend, maar dat maakt de buzz rondom het jonge drietal des te groter. Absoluut niet te missen op London Calling.

The Bohicas is een talentvolle Britse band die intelligente gitaarmuziek maakt vol verrassende wendingen, hooks en catchy refreintjes. De band is getekend door Domino Records die reeds de opwindende debuutsingle ‘XXX/Swarm’ uitbracht. Muzikaal en qua ambitie zit de band ergens tussen labelgenoten Franz Ferdinand en Arctic Monkeys in. En die werden ook snel heel groot.

Teleman is een Londens trio dat uit de as van Pete and the Pirates is herrezen. Toen het heel stil werd rond deze indieband lieten de leden Thomas Sanders, Jonny Sanders en Pete Cattermoul weten verder te gaan onder de naam Teleman. Met z’n drieën maken ze prachtige pop met veel samenzang en wonderschone melodieën. Denk aan Django Django en Alt-J met “ouderwetse” invloeden van The Beach Boys en The Velvet Underground.

De singer-songwriter Ryan Keen is een artiest die een mooie warme stem heeft, een virtuoos gitarist is en hitgevoelige liedjes schrijft. De jonge Brit klinkt met zijn band eigenlijk een beetje alsof Ray Lamontagne bij Coldplay zingt. Kan wel eens een grote popster worden die Ryan Keen. Het debuutalbum ‘Room For Light’ is uit.

Kins, verantwoordelijk voor dromerige, gitaargedreven popmuziek, werd in 2010 opgericht door frontman Thomas Savage. De band uit Brighton balanceert op het randje van psychedelica met hun uitgesponnen liedjes van meer dan vijf minuten, maar klinkt tegelijkertijd fris, daadkrachtig en bescheiden.

De muziekscene uit Montreal is op zijn hoogtepunt: Arcade Fire, Patrick Watson, Grimes, en natuurlijk Folly and the Hunter. Deze veelbelovende folkgroep bracht in 2013 ‘Tragic Care’ uit en is sindsdien niet meer te stoppen. Melodieuze folk met veel ruimte voor sfeer, arrangementen en eigenaardige geluidjes. 

Fans van Cut Copy, Django Django en Crystal Fighters opgelet: hier is Wild Cub. ‘Thunder Clatter’ is de single die wereldwijd de radio’s overnam. Tropisch, opzwepend en bij vlagen een beetje melancholisch zoals New Order of The Cure. 

'Sweater Weather' is de veel gedraaide single van de band The Neighbourhood uit Californië. Dit nummer is een flinke hit aan het worden. In eigen land heeft ‘Sweater Weather’ het reeds geschopt tot de nummer 1 positie in de Billboard's Alternative Charts en nu is de rest van de wereld aan de beurt. De single staat op het debuutalbum ‘I Love You’ dat vol staat met deze hitgevoelige indie. Donker en duister met een fris hip randje.


The John Steel Singers uit Brisbane, Australië maken melancholische, urgente indierock. Deze nieuwkomers kunnen niets verkeerd doen bij fans van Broken Social Scene, Deerhunter  en Cloud Control. De muziek wordt door de zesmansformatie vrolijk aangekleed door spannende arrangementen en blazers. Optimistisch, opgewekt en luchtig. ‘Everything’s A Thread’ is het debuutalbum dat zojuist is uitgebracht.

Datum: vrijdag 9 en zaterdag 10 mei 2014
Prijs: €20,00 dagkaart en €35,00 passe-partout excl. lidm. (€3,50 p.maand / €25 p.jaar)
Open: 18:00 
Aanvang: 18:30

579783978759015.description:
She is Marinah. Her name was Marina Abad and in an earlier life she was lead singer and central to the creative force within Barcelona’s Ojos de Brujo.

Marinah presents her new project El Baile de las Horas for the first time in the UK. Marinah’s new sound combines some elements from Ojos but also a new softness in her voice and a fresh sense of positivity in her music and lyrics.

Marinah composed all the tracks on the new El Baile de las Horas record and her long time collaborator and live band member Carlos Sarduy produced and arranged them. Carlos has frequently worked with Javier Limón, Buika, Ainhoa Arteta and Ojos de Brujos and his trumpet playing can be heard on the films ‘Chico & Rita’ by Fernando Trueba and Pedro Almodovar’s ‘The Skin I Live In’.

Marinah says, “This is the first stop on a journey that has just started and that without a doubt will take us to different and unfamiliar ports.

These songs that appear on the record have been with me for a while, they sounded fresh and different in my head. I felt as if they were part of me, as a woman, a mother and a musician.

I had to make this record to be loyal to the present…. So I could evolve, continue being sincere and continue learning about myself.

Whilst writing the songs, I was listening to the voices of children, to strings, to electric guitars, flamenco guitars…. and to the waves of the sea.”
579783978759015.name: Marinah (from Ojos de Brujo)  / La Linea 14 / London 11 April

583688118371184.description:
This Buena Vista Social Club piano prodigy and Havana Cultura star has grabbed Cuban jazz by the horns and drawn it, hot, stylish and sultry, into the 21st century. Roberto Fonseca looks back to his Caribbean roots while striking forwards with a sensuous lyricism that effortlessly updates Cuba’s musical lineage.

Fonseca is paired tonight with London’s Family Atlantica whose debut record release last year on Soundway and punchy live shows have quickly won them a following . Their sounds pairs West Africa with Latin America’s Atlantic Coast, with a London beat firmly in the middle.

“It’s a heartbeat for contemporary Afro-Cuban life.’ Times

‘A fabulously gifted pianist, composer and band leader with a gift for melody that outshines more celebrated peers…one of a new breed who can transcend musical boundaries through sheer quality’ Guardian

‘A genre-busting tour de force… the lyricism of his playing recalls Herbie Hancock but he can animate the courtly dramas of Cuban tradition… a joyous poignant offering’ Observer

‘Sensuous, fresh, modern – Roberto Fonseca brings the piano dazzlingly to life’ Daily Telegraph
583688118371184.name: Roberto Fonseca + Family Atlantica / La Linea 14 / London 8 April

Spring is here! And it’s time for another Liquicity event in Amsterdam. Make sure to gather your energy and keep the 19th of April free, as we will return with a night you will not forget. We present to you a unique line-up including UK's finest: London Elektricity, well known for tracks such as "Just One Second" and praised for his wide array of musical influences. We will also bring the all time liquid legends: Bachelors of Science who fly over all the way from the US to be part of this spectacular night!

Another up and coming artist, well known to the Liquicity YouTube listeners, is: Dimension. He will expose you to one hour of funky dance floor Drum and Bass! The night won’t be complete without a few of our own. Maduk, Feint and Rameses B will of course be there too. They will be making sure you can enjoy yet another memorable night, full of warm bass lines and melodic bangers.

Hugh Hardie, who's known for his smooth and colorful music, will be making his awaited debut in the Netherlands! With instant classics such as "Tearing Me Apart" he is on his way to make a name for himself in the Drum and Bass scene. Furthermore, we’re bringing in Vandera & Dave Owen for some more liquid flavour. Both of them have been signed to LTJ Bukems “Good looking” label and will make sure to keep the liquid rolling.

So don’t miss out on our final event before the summer break!

A triple workshop evening brought to you by We Make London supported by Ruby Dock and Camden Lock Market.

A night of creation with Shrinkes Brooches, Pimp my Cup and Memory Collage workshops. Included in the 2 hour workshop are: all materials, a glass of wine and nibbles whilst you have fun creating some exciting pieces.

Memory Collage workshop:

Come and discover the collage technique with the artist ‘Amandine in the Garden’. 

You will learn the technique of collage with different materials, media and tools to create your own composition inspired by personal memories. Your creation will be made from fabrics, paper, dried flowers, letters or literature and some of your own special pieces. Your work will create a keepsake of your memories to treasure.

All Materials will be included but it is recommended that if you have any materials about your memories, such as pictures, letters, books, fabrics that are personal to you and these can be used in your composition. Please note that they will be cut, ripped and glued to create your final piece.

Pimp my Cup:

An opportunity to doodle or create a masterpiece that you can eat your cake off or sip your tea out of! Lead by the creator of ‘By Candlelight 27’ and supported by fellow artist ‘Lizzes Beautiful Art’. They will be able to show you techniques whilst have some fun expressing your inner artist.

You will have an option of either decorating a plate or a cup to take home with you.

Shrinkes Brooches:

Make your own jewellery in Shrinkes Plastic, watch in amazement as your work curls and unfolds to produce a miniature version. This fantastic plastic is so much fun, you will be hooked and want to do again and again!

You will get a chance to make your own brooch, by drawing on the Shrinkes Plastic. With the help of the team you can watch it shrink and have a brooch pin attached ready for you to wear the next day.

All workshops include materials.

You have an opportunity to join in all three events that are running, some will take longer than others to complete depending on the detail added to your pieces.

The workshop will last for roughly 2 hrs.

Included in the workshop price is your first drink and some nibbles. Should you wish to purchase further drinks or food there will be more available on the evening from Ruby Dock.
585117924928675.location: Ruby Dock, 45 - 46 Camden Lock Pl, London, GB
585117924928675.name: A triple workshop evening brought to you by We Make London

Flex your muscles and get pumped up this Friday April 11th as Intimate Productions hosts London duo BICEP at the Electric Owl.

London based, Belfast-born blogger-production-dj duo Matt McBriar and Andy Ferguson need little by way of introduction. Their Feel MyBicep blog is the go-to place for tastemakers world-wide for lost and forgotten disco / chicago house / detroit techno / Italo edits and everything in-between. On a production tip, they have released on such labels as Throne Of Blood, Traveller Records, Mystery Meat and 2012 saw their critically acclaimed vinyl only track $tripper get released on Love Fever hitting the top chart spots on Juno and selling out worldwide. Their remix track record has also been excellent with them stamping their distinguished sound upon works from Blondes, Toby Tobias, Chamboche, Blood Orange, Cosmic Kids and many more for labels such as Domino, Wolf Music and Tusk. Will Saul then snapped them up for his label Aus, with a collaborative EP including tracks You and Dont which once again hit number one on Juno and caused the Beatport charts some bother. The Feel My Bicep label launched in September 2012 with the highly sought after vinyl only release titled Vision Of Love, which received great press worldwide and once sold out whilst hitting the top spot at the retail outlets. Room hosts at Fabric, a residency at We Love in Ibiza and bookings at Manchesters Warehouse Project then ensued, with 2012 ending very nicely for the duo who came in at 32 on the Resident Advisor End Of Year DJ Poll.

Since the start of 2013, Bicep have toured North America, Australia and South East Asia as well as countless shows throughout Europe and all over the UK. Their Stash EP released on Aus in April received great support across the board and their collaboration with Simian Mobile Disco called Sacrifice (Out on Delicacies) has become one of this years festival anthems for many DJs. Forthcoming remixes for John Talabots label Hivern Discs are soon to drop and the second release on Feel My Bicep records is also in the pipeline.

Tickets available online at www.intimateproductions.com

We're proud to present you and bring you the Love LIKE London Kizomba Festival.

This Festival is brought to you by a great partnership of Mambo City and LIKE Festival.

Mambo City are one of the Biggest promoters for quality events in London, the UK and Abroad.
LIKE Festival - Lisbon's International Kizomba Energy Festival is claimed by many as one of the best Kizomba Festivals in the World.

Together we start a new journey and wrap up for you the Love LIKE London... the London Edition of LIKE Festival.

The Park Inn Hotel London, Heathrow, which is a four-star Hotel located minutes from Heathrow Airport. Boasting 895 stylish rooms and suites, a ballroom for up to 700 dancers, on-site fitness centre, and high-speed Internet access, this convenient Heathrow hotel is the ideal choice for leisure guests.

592218274219170.description:
Support: RICKIE AND MELVIN FROM KISS FM + AMI CARMINE, Advance Tickets: £30

You are invited to see the famous Romanian Pop starlet INNA, live in London this summer at The Forum, Kentish Town.  

The support will play commercial hits and the atmosphere will be warmed up by INNA and her dance acts.

INNA's popular songs:

10 Minutes - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ci0ccJ_Z7jM
Hot - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ajJ43siTwo
Sun is up - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VNfFTuIk-dQ
Cola Song (feat. J Balvin) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yz2658gzOuM

Purchase advance tickets online from:

http://www.ticketmaster.co.uk/inna-london-11-07-2014/event/1F004C79CA4DA9B0
http://www.skiddle.com/whats-on/London/The-Forum/INNA-Live-in-London/12147498
http://www.seetickets.com/event/inna/the-forum/786740
http://www.ticketweb.co.uk/event/inna-tickets/114847

With an impressive string of hits and numerous awards under her trendy belt and the clubs of Europe, Middle East, Latin and Central America already at her feet, INNA is a fierce musical phenomenon.

Towards the end of 2007, Inna met with the guys from Play&Win and changed the history of dance music as we knew it. Inna’s popularity and the impact of her first single – “HOT”, brought her the Platinum Record. In 2010, as Inna became a household name and her music a fixture in the clubs, “HOT” spread all over Europe, the single receiving airplay in Russia, Poland, Bulgaria, Serbia, Slovakia, Greece, Belgium and The Netherlands and reaching the first position in the U.K. Dance Charts. In March 2010, “HOT” also brought INNA the Platinum Record. It was then only a matter of time for the song “Amazing” to go straight to number one in several territories as well, and thus the story kept on going, as all her other singles from her first album, “Love”, “Deja-Vu” and “Sun is Up” became hits.

At the beginning of this spring, INNA released her third album, “Party Never Ends”, and it seems to be one of her fans’ favorite. Her latest single, “More than Friends”, a featuring with Daddy Yankee, is already number one in Argentina and aired on radios in Mexico, Japan, Puerto Rico, Bulgaria, Romania, Poland, Germany, Spain, Turkey and France, as it appears to be one of this upcoming summer’s hottest hits. Hot, lovely and amazing INNA is not just a deja vu success story. It’s a fresh and surprising one and the best is yet to come, as the world is big, the clubs are waiting and THE PARTY NEVER ENDS.

Strictly Over 18s (Photographic ID may be required to gain entry)

*Early Bird Tickets Sold Out*

595106293900851.description:
WHITE MINK
Electro Swing Speakeasy

Invite your friends NOW - this is likely to SELL OUT fast.

After our return to London in Feb, when our debut at VILLAGE UNDERGROUND was a massive SELL OUT, we are delighted to announce yet another absolutely STUNNING line-up for May. This will be our last London show here until October...

ADVANCE TICKETS available NOW at just £17: 

BILLETTO: http://bit.ly/WhiteMink_May3
CROWDSURGE: http://www.crowdsurge.com/whitemink 

or from the box-office (£21 for final ticket allocation) - BE QUICK.

----------

Have a look at last months event pics here:
https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10152404991993296.1073741831.262314363295

----------

"Sublimely decadent" (Clash Magazine)

"One helluva turbo-charged party" (Time Out)

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 

STARRING:

★ THE SWEET LIFE SOCIETY
One of Italy's hottest exports at the moment. About to tour the US and recently signed to major label WARNER MUSIC, The Sweet Life Society are an exceptional big band, mixing hip-hop and swing to create the most incredible party atmosphere: have a look at this:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IVMyDdqXcjE
Or their single MY SOUND:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HIMtRRPs9nc
Read more about them on our Blog here: http://www.freshlysqueezedmusic.com/news.html

We will be bringing over the FULL BIG BAND plus their AV show!

★ NATTY CONGEROO & THE FLAMES OF RHYTHM
On the vintage tip we have support from the exceptional NATTY BO and his Cab Calloway-inspired band. Natty is the brains behind, and the frontman (er...) in front of, both the mighty TOP CATS and world-famous SKA CUBANO so expect a first rate live show band and world class vintage swing stylings... they will be on early so do not miss!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ffng2BOIgz4

★ DJ and Compere NICK HOLLYWOOD
Described as a 'suave impressario' by The Independent and 'the godfather of Electro Swing' by The Telegraph, Nick is behind the Freshly Squeezed Record label and the award-winning WHITE MINK : BLACK COTTON compilation series...

★ DJ CHRIS TOFU 
One of the most important figures behind the rise of Electro Swing not just in the UK but worldwide over the last 3 years. Chris will DJ in his own inimitable 'selector' style…

★ THE BEES KNEES
London's finest flappers return to grace the White Mink stage. In the interim these girls have been hosting their own swing nights and Charleston classes at world famous deco icon Claridges Hotel in London no less. Pure class…

★ TERPSIKHORE
Immersive theatrics from these monochrome mime artists straight out of the silent movies…

★ VIV THE SPIV
This discerning gentleman will be on hand to entertain you while flogging quality goods and merchandise as you wait for your drink. Its not nicked, its just not paid for yet…

★ DEPARTMENT OF BRILLIANT AV 
One of the signature elements of a White Mink night, maverick AV genius of crazy light-bending inventions and trickery. Gerred has created visuals for us but is also behind the success of people like Public Service Broadcasting and lots more...

If all that isn't enough to convince you, have a look at our past event gallery here: http://www.flickr.com/photos/whitemink/

Or to hear what we're about listen to our WHITE MINK 3 compilation CD1 - modern:
https://soundcloud.com/freshlysqueezed/white-mink-3-minimix

And CD2 vintage:
https://soundcloud.com/freshlysqueezed/white-mink-3-minimix-disc-2

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 

TICKETS: 

To avoid serious disappointment, please buy tickets very well in advance...

We have a strictly limited capacity!

EARLY BIRD: £17
LAST TICKET RELEASE (or on the door if we have any left): £21

http://www.crowdsurge.com/whitemink
Billetto: http://bit.ly/WhiteMink_May3

VENUE:
VILLAGE UNDERGROUND
54 Holywell Ln, London EC2A 3PQ
020 7422 7505

Visit their website here: 

http://villageunderground.co.uk/ (also their box office)

DOORS: 
9.30pm - 3am

DRESS CODE:
While we don't wish to enforce a dress code, we do very strongly believe that dressing up will significantly add to your enjoyment of our events while adding to the ambience for everyone else. Please make an effort. You will be rewarded. (See previous event pics here: http://www.facebook.com/media/albums/?id=262314363295 or visit our Pinterest page for inspiration here: http://www.pinterest.com/whitemink/ )

http://www.whitemink.co.uk

And remember to invite your friends.

xMinx

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 

We were named by Mixmag this year as the second best party in the UK. As the originators of a speakeasy and swing revival, we are proud to be "taking clubland by storm" (The Daily Telegraph). We founded London's Electro Swing Club which blew up into a world-wide phenomena and are responsible for the eponymous, album-charting White Mink : Black Cotton (Electro Swing vs Speakeasy Jazz) CD series. We have curated numerous amazing festival stages annually from Glastonbury's Shangri La to Bestival's Spiegeltent, and we continue to promote sell-out UK shows by bands like Parov Stelar and Caravan Palace. We have a lot to live up to! 

So this better be good...

Visit: http://www.whitemink.co.uk

595674277186667.description:
APRES AVOIR FAIT SWINGUER le tout PARIS, L'APERO SE PASSE AU BALAJO ET PROPOSE DÉSORMAIS UNE FORMULE MÊLANT LES MUSIQUES VINTAGE, L'ESPRIT CABARET BURLESQUE , PIN UP ET LES RYTHMES ACTUELS

 9 rue de Lappe M° Bastille
 19h à Minuit et ensuite soirée club jusqu'à l'aube
 Entrée : 5 euros de 19h à 21h puis 10 euros (l'accès à l'Apero permet de rester ensuite sur la nuit club).

 Ouvert depuis 1936, à deux pas de la Place de la Bastille, Le Balajo, plus qu'une institution, est un lieu spécifique et unique en son genre où se retrouvent les amateurs de danse dans une ambiance typique et unique grâce à son décor qu'ils imaginent fidèle aux traditions d'antan et grâce aussi à la musique moderne appropriée. 
 De grandes marques de Luxe comme Hermes ou Kenzo ont d'ailleurs choisi le lieu pour y mettre en scène certains de leurs évènements.

 DJ Turky et Bart&Baker aux commandes depuis 3 ans des Aperos de la Machine du Moulin Rouge ont décidé de proposer au Balajo un évènement unique à Paris, puisqu'il va méler performances Live, cabaret, musiques vintage couvrant un large spectre de style, le tout dans une ambiance jeune et pin up. 
 
------------------------------------------------------------------------

 PROGRAMME DE LA SOIREE EN COURS !

 19h à 21h : Swing / Lindy hop avec Alex et Prisca Lb
 21h à Minuit : show burlesque et cabaret , en alternance des DJ sets,

 Miss Dee en meneuse de revue , pour la présentation des numéros cabaret, burlesque, et de show live accompagnée Mademoiselle O pour l'assister !

BURLESQUE & CABARET ------------------------------------------

EMPRESS STAH

Empress Stah est une artiste de renommée internationale qui a gagné de nombreux prix. Artiste de l’air et productrice, elle a développé un style cabaret néo-burlesque. Sa performance emblématique est « Swinging from the Chandelier ».

Connue pour son style provocateur et controversé, Stah a donné des représentations dans le monde entier. Elle a également produit son propre spectacle de cabaret à Londres « The Very Best of Empress Stah ».
Elle a collaboré avec Damien Hirst et Harvey Nichols. Elle a également partagé l’affiche avec Dita Von Teese, le cirque du Soleil et a fait des apparitions aux The Box à New York, La Clique et les Brits Awards.

www.EmpressStah.com 

SIRODE IAGAH
 Effeuilleuse burlesque, danseuse tribale ATS et tribal fusion au sein de la compagnie Deviant Sisters, Sirode est une pionnière du tribal fusion burlesque. Elle associe ces univers différents dans un mélange des genres original et haut en couleur.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Sirode/190927864302724?fref=ts

LILA CHUPA HOOPS, la spécialiste du hoola hoop burlesque!
 La véritable ambassadrice du grand retour du hula-hoop en France revient au Balajo pour présenter un nouveau numéro hoolesque burlesque et lumineux!

http://www.lilachupahoops.com/

MARIE TOURNELLE
 Danseuse ayant commencé chez les filles de joie pour être maintenant à la Tassel Tease Company et se produit toute seule à la Pretty Propaganda , au petit cabaret des Bois et sera prochainement sur la scène de  Beauties of Burlesque.

CORALY CORAZON
Danseuse passionée par le mouvement et la magie d´etre une femme. Biographie Danseuse professionelle passionée,elle crée sa propre Compagnie "OH LALA PARIS" á Mexico qui donne naissance á son personnage Burlesque. Découvrez le monde sensible,sensuel et authentique de Coraly Corazon.
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Coraly-Corazon/479374855476668?ref=hl


MOULLA & MARGAUX - AUGMENTED MAGIC
Novateurs, ingénieux, drôles, fascinants... les adjectifs manquent pour qualifier ces deux jeunes artistes bourrés de talent. Si leur spécialité est la magie en réalité augmentée, ils maîtrisent aussi parfaitement les grands classiques de l'illusion. Alors, laissez vous surprendre ! A savourer bouche-bée.
http://www.moulla.fr/


Initiation Danse Marty & MissDee :Charleston ou Jive, dans tous les cas ça swingue et c'est fun!
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------

Nos numéros burlesques avec notre partenaire / LETTINGO PROD A l'origine de la création du Lettingo Cabaret, Lettingo Prod est une association de promotion des spectacles et artistes de cabaret moderne. Fusion des genres, carrefour des disciplines, laboratoire expérimental à émotions, venez tenter l'expérience du lâcher prise lors de leur soirée ! Plus d'informations sur le site de la soirée : 
www.thelettingocabaret.com https://www.facebook.com/LettingoProd 

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------

 INITIATION : MARTY & MISS DEE

 Dance with them… boogie teenage 
 Deux jeunes fans des musiques vintage des années 1950,ils se sont rencontrés sur la piste de danse du célèbre Balajo .
 Une rencontre explosive !

 Fils et filles de, danseurs de claquettes et de rock’n’roll....
 Ils ont une énorme passion pour la danse, les fringues et les films des fifties
 Miss Dee, la classe dans toutes ses figures fait rêver toutes l'assistance quand elle se met à bondir sur la piste de danse !

 Marty qui ne laisse pas indifférent les filles grâce à son charme, ses cheveux gominés sont look rock’n’roll et son style de danse !

 Marty & Miss Dee ont réussi a crée leur style en mélangeant rock’n’roll comme on le dansait dans les années cinquante, boogie woogie, swing, le tout ponctué d’acrobaties, avec une énergie et un humour à toute épreuve !
 Les années cinquante est leur période culturelle de référence, tant par la danse que le look.
 Leur duo est né sur des évènements de leur ami DJ Turky, créateur d’évènements Fifties sound à Paris : soirée rock’n’roll au Balajo , Paname Burlesque, Brocante Vintage, les nombreux bals et soirées où Marty & Miss Dee ont pu trouver leur style et leur place parmi la family fifties !

 Depuis début 2011, ils donnent ensemble les cours de danse rock’n’roll au Balajo avant la soirée, transmettant leur passion et leur énergie.

 Ce sont des cours de rock festif et c’est justement ce qui fait la différence, tachant d’enseigner à vraiment ressentir la musique, à se lâcher et à s’amuser !
 A présent, ils travaillent à la création de numéros et de shows et sont prêts à partager ce patrimoine culturel !

https://www.facebook.com/pages/MartyMissDee/280130932010351

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------

 DJ TURKY ( FIFTIES SOUND)

 Un mec pas tout à fait comme les autres...
 ce Turky, leader, organisateur, DJ des évènements fifties sound à Paris, Un passionné de musique vintage depuis de nombreuses années, la modestie en plus. fils de musicien, il a fait ses armes au contact de ses frères amateurs de bon vieux rock’n’roll. figure incontournable des fameux mercredis rock au Balajo depuis 18 ans, il a organisé de nombreux évènements ( la guinguette du martin pêcheur a Champigny-sur-Marne , les bals swing a paris plage, bal de la bourse , Il a depuis écumé les routes d’Europe et les quatre coins du monde pour étoffer sa collection de disques personnelle. Ce DJ choc de swing, rock, rhythm’n’ blues et rockab’ sait fédérer depuis plus de dix-huit ans toutes les générations. Passé maître de cérémonie au sein de divers établissements parisiens et festivals dans toute l’Europe et Amérique du nord, il organise aussi des vide-greniers, brocante et vide dressing vintage à succès et des soirées burlesques et du festival swing broc vintage

www.fiftiessound.com 

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------

 BART&BAKER ( NEO SWING / CLUB JAZZ / ELECTRO SWING)
 Bart&Baker, DJs depuis 2005 et producteurs de compilations et de morceaux originaux depuis 2009 vouent un amour immodéré au Grand Music-hall et aux artistes qui créent du rêve et de la bonne humeur. Jo « Baker » a choisi son surnom en hommage à la grande Joséphine, croisée en famille et qui lança à sa maman musicienne, lors d’un dîner, « laissez moi adopter votre fils ! ». Pour « Bart » Sampson, l’origine du pseudonyme est autrement plus actuelle, puisqu’il s’inspire directement d’un des personnages de la série animée impertinente « Les Simpson ». Dès lors, rien d’étonnant à ce que cohabitent au sein de leur programmation Sammy Davis Jr, Caterina Valente, Danny Kaye ou Todd Terje et surtout que leurs pas croisent inévitablement les tribus du Swing et du Burlesque !

 Suite à l’une de leurs soirées Burlesques, le label Wagram les repère et leur propose de concevoir une série de compilations autour des musiques qu’ils affectionnent et des ambiances qui les inspirent. Naîtront ainsi Swing Party, Electro Swing 3 et en juin 2011, 
 Burlesque Swing une déclaration d’amour musicale au milieu du Burlesque et aux danseurs de swing. Sur cette dernière, ils remixent un titre méconnu d’Eartha Kitt et font chanter pour la première fois Lada Redstar, surprenante dans la version Electro Swing du cultissime « Jukebox », interprété dans les années 50 par le crooner italien Fred Buscaglione. Suivent en Octobre 2011, Saint-Germain-Des-Près Café – The Vintage Edition qui contient des titres de Jazz dansants. En Novembre 2011, Bart&Baker signent la quatrième édition de la compilation ElectroSwing, sélectionnent l’ensemble des titres et proposent trois inédits dont un remix du titre de Dimitri From Paris, Sacré Français. Le cinquième volume toujours conçu par leurs soins vient de sortir le 5 Novembre 2012. Ils y remixent Caravan Palace, Skeewiff et Gabin et invite l’auditeur à découvrir le meilleur de l’électro swing en 23 titres.

 En 2012, le duo signe avec le label parisien ENTOUKA PRODUCTIONS et déjà sorti 9 Eps pour le label et leur première collection de titre « Introducing, Bart&Baker est sortie en mars 2013, suivi par Bart&Baker, remixed en Novembre 2013.

Leur premier album entièrement composé de chansons originales sortira en 2014

www.bartandbaker.com

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------

601023463286671.description:
Focallocal is a community creating positive collective action for social and cultural change. Our events and projects are designed to bring people closer together and make the world a happier more connected place. visit www.focallocal.org to join us!

We run monthly Pillow Fights for Connection so of course we couldnt miss joining the Urban Playground Movements yearly International Pillow Fight Day: http://pillowfightday.com/about.php

....

Invite all your friends, this is going to be a wonderful memory you and they will cherish for the rest of your life!!! do not accept no for an answer from them, yourself or your boss!

The fight starts in the square at 3pm and goes until your arms are too exhausted to continue, when most people take their pillows to St James's Park to relax in the sunshine.

Please don't find yourself looking in the mirror on the 8th wondering how much cooler you'd look today, and how much bigger your smile would be if you had been at a Humungous pillow fight in the heart of London yesterday! ..no-one wants to be that girl/guy!!

Notes:
1) Cheap pillows can scratch without a pillow case so please bring one along.
2) Just because its a pillow doesn't mean you cant hurt folk, if you a big strong person hitting a lil person take it easy.
3) Do not hit anyone with a camera, they are our friends!
4) If someone's got a hard, heavy pillow, please tell them! or they will happily carry on swinging obliviously upsetting everyone around them.
5) Take your pillow away with you (i normally give mine to the homeless on the way home).
6) Smile and have fun - today is all about positivity!

update: the London mayors office have asked me to cancel this event. as its not mine i have no ability to do this, but they are trying to cancel this event by closing off part of the square - it's up to you if you choose to go or not. 

you'd be welcome to join us at our monthly pillow fights for connection on www.focallocal.org instead :0)
601023463286671.name: Focallocal.org joins London International Pillow Fight Day 2014 @ Trafalgar Square

604736286256490.description:
All tickets for Heaven on May 4th are SOLD OUT.
No tickets available on the door.

Doors open at 9:30pm.

Celebrating 18 years of Hospital Records!

First up, a little history lesson... The first ever Hospitality event took place at Herbal way back in 2001. After five years of monthly shindigs at the East end sweatbox, Hospitality took the giant leap to super club Heaven for quarterly parties, which instantly became the stuff of legend. With Hospital Records artists like High Contrast, London Elektricity, Danny Byrd and Cyantific the stars of the show, and playing host to special guests such as Andy C, Fabio & Grooverider, DJ Marky, Noisia, Teebee and Calyx, Hospitality @ Heaven revolutionised and revived drum & bass in the capital. Matter at the O2 Arena became our new home in 2008 and after nine completely sold out parties at the Greenwich institution it was time to move on again! 2010 marked the beginning of a new era for the London event, as Hospitality took over the O2 Academy in Brixton, where we still to this day showcase spectacular line ups to the masses.

We are celebrating Hospital Records 18th birthday next year, so in honour of this milestone we are taking an emotional trip down memory lane by revisiting iconic venues across London that have helped to make Hospitality events what they are today.

February 7th we head up to Building Six at the O2 in North Greenwich. Memories of hosting parties at the O2 stretch back to 2008, when we began our 2-year residency at superclub Matter, where each & every show was a sold-out, unmissable experience. Fast forward to today & we are returning to the O2 to brand new venue Building Six, where we will be bringing a world class lineup, soundsystem and atmosphere... as standard.

Then on May 4th we will be stepping even further back into the history books for a one-off spectacular at our beloved Heaven – a maze of dancefloors, bars and sound systems located under the arches of Charing Cross station in the heart of central London, a nightclub engraved on the heart of British rave culture. Those who remember the original Hospitality events at Heaven will know these were really special occasions, and we aim to recapture that vibe in 2014 with the best artists and the friendliest crowd. And for those who never made it to Heaven all those years ago, this is your chance to experience an integral piece of Hospitality history.

Both events promise to be something to saviour, completely unique whilst including everything you love about Hospitality.

To join us on our journey, simply follow the links below (or the "Get Tickets" link above) & we'll see you on the dancefloor!

Building Six - Feb 7:
SOLD OUT

Heaven - May 4:
SOLD OUT
 
x

607129419372561.description:
CALL FOR ARTISTS - MODERN PANIC V - LONDON 2014

We are now accepting submissions for artists to feature in our next exhibition. Applications will be accepted from all styles and forms of art, from artists working in any medium, from any location in the world.

Concept
The Modern Panic exhibitions are inspired by the work of the original Panic Movement, which was comprised of artists Alejandro Jodorowsky, Fernando Arrabal and Roland Topor, who created provocative live arts events in France during 1960s. The works intended aim was to slice through the bourgeois art world with the aim to be a catalyst towards liberation of thought within the viewer.  Modern Panic follows in the footsteps of this movement and aims to exhibit the new wave of modern artists.

Following on from our previous exhibitions, we are looking for work that covers one or more of the following areas: Panic /  Provocation / Controversy / Surreal / Outsider Art / Grotesque / Playful/Trickster / Existential / Inner Beauty / Confrontational / Disarming / Subverting /
Political / Satire / Modern Society / Freedom of Speech / Boundary breaking / Emotionally Powerful

If you think you work might work, please complete an application.

Exhibition Date
Nov 2014 - London

Applications 
You will need to prepare a short submission proposal about your piece(s) (approx 100 words) & biography (no more than 300 words). Please upload one clearly labelled image with your name and title or a selection of images in a clearly labelled zip/rar folder. Please keep images to a small size (i.e. no larger than 2mb each) For video submission - put a link in the proposal section. 

Entries close 1st July 2014

To submit your work please visit :
www.guerrillazoo.com/artist-submissions

Information on Modern Panic :
www.guerrillazoo.com/modern-panic-series
607129419372561.name: Call for Artists - Modern Panic - London

Sogni di suonare in un club londinese? 
Vinci e vola in Inghilterra – Battle of the band! London Calling Band Contest 2014 è un concorso rivolto ad artisti e band, ideato e realizzato da Crazy Bull Café Genova e Plastic Monkey (http://www.plasticmonkey.co.uk),  
 in collaborazione con Andrea Di Marco, Caterina Angeli e Paola Popa.
Il primo premio del London Calling Band Contest 2014 consiste nell’esibizione live in un club Londinese durante un week end tra giugno e luglio 2014.
Il viaggio e l’albergo saranno completamente spesati e l’organizzazione dell’intero week end, dall’arrivo in aeroporto alla partenza, sarà a cura del nostro collaboratore Plastic Monkey.
Ci saranno premi per il secondo e terzo posto ed un premio speciale per il maggior numero di voti del pubblic"London Calling Band Contest 2014" è un concorso rivolto ad artisti e band che propongono musica inedita e originale, ideato e realizzato da Crazy Bull Café Genova in collaborazione con Plastic Monkey.

I vincitori del concorso avranno la possibilità di esibirsi dal vivo all'interno di un esclusivo live club di Londra, tra giugno e luglio 2014.
Anche per chi arriverà al secondo e al terzo posto sono previsti dei premi che verranno elargiti da RedHouse Strumenti Musicali:
per il secondo classificato sarà possibile sfruttare per 3 ore la sala di registrazione per la produzione di una demo.
Il terzo classificato, invece, riceverà un buono spesa del valore di € 100,00.
E' previsto un premio speciale per chi collezionerà il maggior numero di voti da parte del pubblico.

In collaborazione con Andrea Di Marco, Caterina Angeli e Paola Popa. 

Scoprite il regolamento e scaricate il modulo d'iscrizione al contest: 

http://www.crazybullgenova.it/london-calling-band-contest-2014/

612511192155097.description:
QUIMBY & IAN SIEGAL

MONDAY 12TH MAY 2014

Time: 7.30pm until 11.00pm
 
@ SCALA
275 PENTONVILLE ROAD
LONDON
N1 9NL

Tel: 020-7833-2022

Admission: £19.50 (in advance)

Doors: £25.00

Tickets: www.ticketweb.co.uk 08444 771 000 or Scala box office between 10am and 6pm Mon-Fri for ticket purchase (not collection)


In 2011, Quimby one of Hungary's most innovative and popular alternative rock bands celebrated their 20th anniversary. This 6-piece outfit has released 11 albums; contributed to a variety of Magyar film soundtracks; provided the music to two major theatre productions - including a critically acclaimed adaptation of Shakespeare's "Twelfth Night" and headlining the world renowned Sziget Festival. They create intelligent art rock - forceful; melodic and moving; constantly pushing new boundaries and stylistically unique, arguably with a nod in the directions of Nick Cave, Lou Reed and Tom Waits. Tonight they will be showcasing material from their superb latest album entitled "Kaktuszliget.

“most people simply find its music and lyrics incredibly moving, if not hard to resist.”  - Sziget Feti Festival

http://www.quimby.hu/
http://www.facebook.com/quimby.hu
http://www.facebook.com/bolygomusic
 
Ian Siegal takes command of the stage in a manner very few contemporary artists can equal. "Sweat, passion, humour, balls-to-the wind slide guitar and a soul-infused voice big enough to fell trees!" His career got underway in 2003/2004 with two successive European Tours as the opening act for ex-Rolling Stone Bill Wyman's Rhythm Kings. This was soon followed by UK tours as a duo with Bill Morganfield son of the late great Muddy Waters. After releasing a series of very well-received albums (for instance, his 2009 release 'Broadside' topped MOJO's annual Blues Album Chart), he returned to North Mississippi to collaborate with local legends that he collectively dubbed The Mississippi Mudbloods. Joining him were Cody Dickinson and Cody’s brother Luther Dickinson, and Alvin Youngblood Hart. Ian Siegal first met the latter during "The Skinny" album sessions in 2011, when the Grammy-winning guitarist swung by the studio and ended up tracking some guitar and backing vocals.

http://iansiegal.com/

Buses: 30, 73, 214
Underground: Scala is a 3 minute walk from Kings Cross Underground Station. Underground lines at this station include Piccadilly, Northern, Victoria, Hammersmith & City, Metropolitan and Circle lines.
 


Info: http://www.scala-london.co.uk/scala/ 
Jegyek: http://www.ticketweb.co.uk/event/99577

TICKETS STILL AVAILABLE FROM : 
http://www.ticketmaster.co.uk/quimby-ian-siegal-london-12-05-2014/event/1F004C43F3CDD277?artistid=1682536&majorcatid=10001&minorcatid=60

Trash You
Inspired by Funk, Soul and Disco, these influences all shine through in Trash You's music. Early support has come from Weiss, Giom, Audiojack, Steve Lawler, Midnight Love Club and OFF Recordings to name just a few.

Trash You is no stranger to the club scene having spent many years playing in Brighton, London and Ibiza. Residencies held at legendary venues like The Honeyclub, Zap and The Escape have provided a solid experience of working crowds in the way they should be. Drawing on inspiration from Funk, Soul and Disco,

Trash You has kicked off 2014 with his first release on the mighty Berlin based OFF Recordings. ‘Watch This’ has gained support from heavyweights such as Audiojack, Steve Lawler, Weiss and Giom to name a few and reached number 23 in the Beatport Tech House Top 100 chart. The ‘1993 EP’ will follow on from this on up and coming label Midnight Love Club with lead track 1993 already causing a stir on the underground ahead of it’s official release in April. You can expect to hear a Chicago and Detroit influenced sound when Trash You is behind the decks, as he looks to show his respect to days gone by.

Over 18's / please bring photo ID

619933301418573.description:
Sprache: Englisch
Eintritt: 25.–/20.–

Vor zwei Jahren spielte Brian Lobel ein brutales Spiel mit der Freundschaftspflege: Er bat wildfremde Leute zu entscheiden, welche seiner 1300 Facebook-Freunde und -Freundinnen er behalten und welche er löschen sollte. 50 Stunden, 800 Emails von wütenden, faszinierten und amüsierten Freunden und über 2500 Kommentare von Live-Stream-Zuschauern später entstand PURGE als interaktive Lecture-Performance. In einer Mischung aus Game-Show, Liebesgeschichte und Vortrag geht Lobel der zeitgenössischen Definition von Freundschaft nach. Die E-Mails von den Phils, Julias und Heathers, die entweder ein letztes Mal versuchen, ihre Freundschaft zu bezeugen, zynisch resignieren oder auf absurde Weise darlegen, wie ihre Privatsphäre verletzt werde, dokumentieren den Prozess dieser ‹Reinigung› und zeigen auf, dass die Grenze zwischen virtuell und real bei Freundschaften schon viel verwischter ist, als wir gerne glauben würden.

«At its heart, Purge explores what and who our friends really are – in real life and online. It asks what social media is for, how we use it, what we want from it and ultimately whether it means anything to us personally.» (One Stop Arts)

Brian Lobel wurde in New York geboren und lebt und arbeitet heute in London. Seine Performances, welche oft unser Verhältnis zu Körpern im Zentrum haben, zeigt er weltweit in unterschiedlichen Kontexten von Galerien bis medizinischen Hochschulen, von Kabaretts bis Museen und untersucht schmerzhafte Themen auf charmante Weise mit viel Humor

Von und mit: Brian Lobel | Computer-Design: Chipp Jansen | Grafik: Mamoru Iriguchi 

Koproduktion: motiroti London, ANTI Festival of Contemporary Arts Kuopio
619933301418573.name: Brian Lobel (London): Purge

Shine kicks off the Summer with a huge double headline event featuring long standing Shine favourite and dance music Innovator EROL ALKAN taking over the Mandela Hall alongside  the now firmly established House star BREACH. Following a massive breakthrough year in 2013 with his singles 'Everything You Never Had (We Had It All)' feat. Andreya Triana and the all-conquering 'Jack', Breach aka UK-born Amsterdam-based Ben Westbeech recently embarked on a SOLD OUT UK tour with support from Route94.  Opening the main room from Erol and Breach is Phantasy Sound's latest protégé GHOST CULTURE. 

Room 2 is hosted by the nomadic Belfast based party curators NOCTURNE, who welcome the debut of SOUTH LONDON ORDNANCE.  The young UK Bass lead Techno DJ & Producer is a favourite of Scuba's Hotflush imprint and Richie Hawtin's ENTER project because of his his deep yet hard-hitting garage / techno hybrid sound. Support comes from Jordan & Lokokos. 

DSNT takeover room 3 at Shine to showcase some of the best Irish talent with an immersive visual show to compliment the raw sounds. The lineup will feature a live Hardware set from Fran Hartnett, who was handpicked by Surgeon for his Fabric CD plus recent addition to Untold's Pennyroyal label; Myler. Expect uncompromising tough techno with and a visual spectacle to compliment it.

Tickets are priced from just £18, go on sale at 10am on Friday 4th April from usual outlets.

621434537941618.description:
"See More" for English

2014년 현재 전 세계 언더그라운드 댄스뮤직씬의 집단들을 대상으로 ‘전통’과 ‘혁신’이라는 두 가지 잣대를 사용해 평가하여 순위대로 나열한다면, 분명 그 선두에는 Hyperdub 레이블이 존재해야 한다. 작년 12월 창립자인 Kode9이 직접 서울에서 그것을 증명해 보였었다. 그리고 이제는 Hyperdub의 최전방 공격수로서 왕성하게 활동하고 있는 베테랑 프로듀서/디제이 Scratcha DVA가 5월 1일 Cakeshop에서 다시 한 번 그것을 확인시켜 줄 예정이다. 

Scratcha DVA는 분명 주목해야 할 프로듀서이다. 당신이 지금 검색을 통해 몇 대표트랙을 들어본다면 알 수 있겠지만, 케익샵을 거쳐 간 수많은 디제이들의 세트 속에 비밀카드로 숨겨놓은 바로 그 트랙들의 주인공이다. DJ Rashad, Fatima, Kode9, Ikonika, Cornelia, Terror Danjah와 같은 훌륭한 아티스들과의 콜라보를 보여주며 꾸준한 프로듀싱활동을 하고있다. 데뷔 앨범에서 보여준 사운드는 소울풀 했다. 홈그라운드 런던에서 들을 수 있는 각종 조잡하면서도 어센틱한 지역적 사운드를 위트있게 녹여낸 트랙들에서는 평소 생활 속에서 음악을 녹여내는 그의 습성이 여실히 드러났다. 그러나 그의 최근 믹스테입과 EP를 체크해보면 알 수 있듯, 그는 또한 댄스플로어 테러범이기도 하다. 각종 베이스 장르의 리듬에 대한 연구를 통해 무자비하게 플로어를 뒤집어놓는 훌륭한 뱅어 트랙들을 선보이고 있다. 

또한, 그는 좋은 DJ이다. 6년간 전설의 영국발 해적판 라디오 Rinse FM의 장수 아침방송인 “Grimey Breakfast Show”를 담당해 온 터주대감 DJ로, Grime 뿐 아니라 UK Funky, Hip Hop, Garage, Footwork등의 다양한 베이스 장르를 아우르는 선곡으로 런던 씬에 관여해왔으며, 최근에는 매 월 Hyperdub Show를 진행하고 있다. Fabric, FWD, Outlook Festival, BBC Radio 등지에서의 지속해온 그의 행보는 거의 런던 씬의 모든 구석구석에 영향을 끼치고 있다 해도 과언이 아니다. 이제 그의 세트를 서울의 Cakehop에서 그것도 5월의 황금휴가가 시작되는 목요일에 직접 들어볼 수 있게 되었다. 


——————-


If we could evaluate the groups of present global underground dance music scene in 2014 by two standards such as ‘tradition’ and ‘innovation’, Hyperdub label must be on the front row without doubt. Kode9, the founder of the label has so proved it in Seoul last december. And now, Scratcha DVA, Hyperdub’s front row striker and veteran producer/DJ, will show us again on the 1st of May at Cakeshop.       

Scratcha DVA is a producer we must pay attention to. If you listen to some of his major tracks you would easily find out that he’s the dude behind the tracks that numerous DJs who played at Cakeshop use as their hidden cards. He's been constantly producing finest tracks with fellow artists such as DJ Rashad, Fatima, Kode9, Ikonika, Cornelia, and Terror Danjah. The sound he has shown in his debut album is soulful enough. From his tracks, you can obviously check his habit of seeing his daily life as the source of his music by blending all sorts of shoddy but authentic and local sound collected in his homeground London. Though seen on his recent mixtape and EP, he is also a dancefloor terrorist. He’s shown excellent banger tracks that totally have destroyed the floors by serious research on rythms of diverse bass genres. 

Also he is a good DJ. He had hosted “Grimey Breakfast Show” on UK pirate radio Rinse FM for 6 long years playing various bass gems including grime, UK Funky, Hip Hop, Garage and Footwork. Recently he is involving in London’s scene by hosting monthly Hyperdub Show. His acclaimed former steps seen in Fabric, FWD, Outlook Festival, BBC Radio and many other channels are constantly influencing in and outs of London music scene. You can finally get locked into his set in real at Cakeshop in Seoul on thursday, on the beginning of the exciting May holidays.

⁂ Quandol (https://soundcloud.com/quandol)

Line Up:
Sven Väth
Tim Green
Timo Maas Official Page
Anja Schneider
Ralf Kollmann

Visuals by Reach Visuals

In November Cocoon returned for a sell out show at Building Six, making North Greenwich feel a little like Ibiza and left us dreaming of Mediterranean sunrises. This spring Cocoon returns with a medley of producers that have consistently been at the forefront of the European DJ circuit. Joining talisman Sven Vath in the main room will be Tim Green whose reverberated himself through the realms of house and techno with a distinctive charm.

Calling on the very capable mixing fingers of mobilee records to go up against in the Cocoon posse in room 2; label owners Anja Schneider and Ralf Kollmann will be representing the Berlin based outfit. Battling against Timo Maas this will be Anja’s first set in London since she tore apart the Tobacco Dock New Year’s Day party. Seeking only inspiration from the world’s best clubs has allowed Tim Maas to create a sound that’s direct and gripping. Reflecting exactly the mindset of what Cocoon has always been.

One of today's most prominent composer-guitarist alive makes his London debut performing at the Bolivar Hall. Eduardo Martin’s music is currently recorded and performed top guitar performers worldwide such as LAGC, Iliana Matos and Shin Ichi Fukuda. A Grammys award nominee, his creations seamlessly blend classical, Latin american, contemporary and Cuban languages gaining him a great acclaim from both the critics and public in general. Eduardo's former pupil and fellow countryman Ahmed Dickinson will join him playing some of the composer's emblematic guitar duets.

627879260615387.description:
PROGRAMME FOR LONDON BEARFEST
http://issuu.com/londonbearfest/docs/london_bearfest_2014_programme.docx

London Bearfest 2014, a week-long festival celebrating the ever growing international bear scene. Taking place across the capital between 18 – 26 May, it will bring together bears, cubs, otters & admirers from all over the world to enjoy a week of furry and chunky fun in this cosmopolitan city. Throughout the week we will be raising vital funds and awareness for our chosen charity the Ben Cohen StandUp foundation.

As well as major events, club nights & parties there will also be more intimate events, including restaurant outings, cabaret shows, singa-longs and the BIG BEAR bar crawl in aid of the Ben Cohen foundation.

Kurt Hoffman, creative director of London Bearfest 2014 comments: “We’re extremely excited and very proud to bring together the bear community with the very first London Bearfest being held in one of the greatest cities in the world.”  

The Festival takes place right across London: from Soho, Hoxton and Marble Arch to Waterloo and Vauxhall – and it appeals to all ages, groups and persuasions; the overarching aim of London Bearfest 2014 is to celebrate bear culture in all its diverse and hirsute chunky joy!

Participating venues include: The Kings Arms, The Eagle, East Bloc, The RVT, Halfway to Heaven, Palace Superbowl, City Of Quebec, The Arts Theatre, Borough Market, Black Cap, Retro Bar, Manbar, Admiral Duncan, Central Station, Pleasuredrome and Duke Of Wellington
Opening ceremony, Henry VIII Bear tour, Horse Meat Disco, Beartacular!,  Bearfest Bank Holiday Party, Bear City, Tonker, Hot Meat, Eagle party, #BearArt, Bearoke, Ghost Stories, Bear Vs Food, Paunchy, Cub Club, Bear, Theatre night, Bearfest Bowling, Bear Quiz, Bear Recovery, Dirty Beary & London Bears Movie Club. 

We are delighted to be sponsored by Bear World magazine, GROWLr and Prowler.                                               

London Bearfest is committed to raising vital funds and awareness for their chosen charity the Ben Cohen StandUp foundation.

629546057100181.description:
SCRIVETE IL VOSTRO NOME + IL NUMERO DI AMICI DIRETTAMENTE SULLA BACHECA DELL'EVENTO PER ESSERE INSERITI IN LISTA SALTAFILA FReD !"!

VEGA presenta

ANY GIVEN MONDAY "MISS AGM 2014" @ QUBE

Lunedì 14 Aprile presso QUBE, via di Portonaccio n. 212 (Roma)

INGRESSO 5€ + DRINK UNTIL 00.30
AFTER 5€

ONE SHOT ONE EURO UNTIL 24.00 - AFTER 3 SHOT X 5 EURO

LA NOTTE DEL 14 APRILE IL QUBE OSPITERA’ “MISS AGM”, UN CONCORSO DI BELLEZZA NEL PIENO STILE DI ANY GIVEN MONDAY, CURATO CON PROFESSIONALITA’ E NEI MINIMI DETTAGLI MA CARATTERIZZATO ALLO STESSO TEMPO DA QUELLO SPIRITO IRONICO E GENUINO DISTINTIVO DEL NOSTRO PARTY

Il divertirsi, il mettersi in gioco ed in mostra e il far divertire sono le caratteristiche imprescindibili per Any Given Monday, e cosa meglio di un concorso di bellezza old style poteva evocarli?

MISS AGM sarà proprio colei che rispecchierà più di tutte le altre queste qualità a noi care.

E’ chiaro che tutto verrà fatto nel massimo rispetto delle donne poiché il nostro non è un concorso in cui viene celebrata esclusivamente la bellezza, ma piuttosto un contest in cui l’ironia, lo spirito e l’energia da party la faranno da padroni.

E COSI' LUNEDI CI SARA' LA TANTO ATTESA INCORONAZIONE DELLA MISS, CON DEFILE' DELLE 4 FINALISTE SELEZIONATE TRA LE TANTE MAIL GIUNTE

E ALLORA MEMBERS, TIRATE FUORI L'ABITO DELLE GRANDI OCCASIONI, LUNEDI C'è MISS AGM

PEACE, LOVE & ROCK 'N ROME!!
* * * * *

Il lunedì a Barcellona, Londra, Berlino, San Francisco e in molte altre città non è un giorno come gli altri. Accantonati i monotoni impegni e le incombenze dell’inizio, tutti si ritrovano e si perdono nella notte più esclusiva della settimana. La Night Life romana è finalmente competitiva nella scena off mondiale grazie a VEGA e al suo ANY GIVEN MONDAY. Un lunedì per pochi. Scorretto, insolito, non convenzionale, caratterizzato dalle esuberanti sonorità vintage dell’indie-rock e dalle afose rotondità dell’electro. Qualcuno dica a Bob Geldof che ormai “I don’t like mondays” è un’affermazione superata.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY si discosta, sia esteticamente che concettualmente, dai canoni usuali del divertimento notturno. È un format-party “glocale” che importa elementi esterofili all’avanguardia, personalizzandoli notevolmente, e riadattandoli alla realtà off capitolina.

È una festa MADE AT HOME, spiazzante per la sua diversità, dove l’imperativo non è apparire, ma divertirsi. È un happening, un carnevale perenne, è musica, teatro, danza, arte, moda, video, televisione, avanspettacolo e molto, ma molto di più, del prodotto che si ottiene moltiplicando tutti questi fattori tra di loro. È un posto incantato, fuori dal tempo e dallo spazio, veramente FREE e OPEN. È un contenitore difficile da descrivere dove c’è tutto e il contrario di tutto, sempre uguale ma in continuo mutamento.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è un party dall’animo sensibile, il vestito vintage, l’aspetto kitsch e il cuore naif, con uno sguardo avanguardistico e una straordinaria capacità di prendersi in giro e prendere in giro una città tanto seria come Roma. È controcorrente e retrò, ma sempre contemporaneo e attuale, pieno di vizi e stravaganze.

È stato indubbiamente la pluripremiata novità degli ultimi anni, definito da molti addetti ai lavori un “asso piglia tutto che non può non piacere”, aristocratico e popolare, raffinato e cafone, fa delle sue contraddizioni e delle sue divergenze il suo più grande pregio. All’AGM ci sono tutti! Gente di ogni tipo: persone diversissime tra di loro e di tutte le parti del mondo che magicamente ballano, saltano e si divertono insieme.

Il suo essere off e casalingo è diventato in breve tempo di massa, la sua irruzione nel panorama della night life romana è stata come quella di un uragano, che ha cambiato le regole del gioco, spazzando via consuetudini decennali e modificando il concetto stesso di divertimento. Per questi e mille altri motivi l’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è già mito, ma nonostante tutto rimane quello che è sempre stato: un party controcorrente e all’occasione contro anche se stesso, una festicciola tra amici nel salone di casa dove ognuno porta qualche cosa e ci si ritrova a conoscersi tutti.

L’AGM oggi piu' che mai rimane MADE AT HOME, OFF, CHEAP e OPEN rappresentando in festa l’essenza stessa del lunedì. L’AGM è un posto magico: la casa di tutti e il party di tutti nato sotto la buona stella di VEGA, custodito dai dentoni del giaguaro e abitato da sempre nuovi e strabilianti personaggi in cerca d’autore.

LORENZO PALMA
LORENZO PALMA
Nasce a Casale Monferrato (AL) una trentina d'anni fa'.Fin da ragazzino esterna la sua passione per la musica e per la radio.A 15 anni ,pur non avendo mai fatto radio,riesce ad ottenere la sua prima fascia oraria come speaker in un palinsesto radiofonico presso un'importante emittente locale piemontese (Radio Mondo).Qui ci rimane diversi anni e, parallelamente agli studi, impara "il mestiere" per poi muoversi verso altri lidi piu' importanti.Nel 2000 si trasferisce a Milano,quando viene chiamato da un ex braccio destro di Cecchetto per condurre diversi programmi a RadioNumberOne.Nello stesso periodo, dopo aver bazzicato diversi locali piemontesi come vocalist (Mediterraneo,Luna Rossa,Archivolto), inizia a muoversi per la radio nelle zone di Bergamo e Brescia prendendo dimestichezza con la consolle e selezionando dischi.
In poco tempo diventa resident al Rush (BG),al Clubbing (Bg),Notturna (Bg) ,El Tiempo,Havana e Penelope.
Diverse serate per alcuni locali di Milano Old fashion,Vertigo,Punta dell'est e lo Chalet di Torino.

Oltre alla passione per la radio ha collaborato per diversi progetti televisivi:è stato la voce ufficiale di Mtv ,vj a Hit Channel (la radio tv di RTL)) e per diversi anni volto di Gay.tv (il progetto che ha coinvolto molti personaggi come Fabio Canino,La Pina,Diego Passoni,Luca Zanforlin).

Il suo programma principale a Gay.tv era incentrato sulle classifiche e la musica(Gay.fm) e andava in onda proprio da un mq di studio radiofonico.Poi ha condotto altri programmi come Happy Hour e Rumors,in situazioni di estrema comodità e in versione piu' salottiera ospitando diversi personaggi del mondo dello spettacolo e della musica.

Nel frattempo la radio rimane il suo principale impegno,nel 2004 oltre alla tv collabora con Viva fm e ,piu' tardi, nel 2006 inizia una nuova avventura con Discoradio (Mi) ,che dopo poco tempo viene assorbita dal gruppo romano di Rds.

Nel 2007 grazie a Dimensione Suono Roma (gruppo Rds) si trasferisce nella Capitale e, a distanza di qualche mese è resident dj del Tommy il sabato sera dell'Alibi.

DISCOUNT
E' una mente esaltata che ha invertito il celebre precetto "la qualità è il miglior risparmio" con il più insolito "il risparmio è la migliore qualità". In virtù di questa anomala filosofia di vita è costretto a procurarsi musica solamente a prezzi stracciati. Le svendite di cd negli autogrill, le musicassette allegate nei giornali ed i dischi rubati da polverose soffitte sono trai suoi migliori metodi per poter allestire dei djset di un certo livello con pochi centesimi.
E state tranquilli il divertimento è garantito tutto a 0,99 €!
Soddisfatti o rimborsati...

MOKAI
Odia le catalogazioni, i compartimenti stagni, è un liberista, non si definisce dj, ma selezionatore. Il denominatore comune è il viaggio, e tutta l'arte che ne scaturisce. L'arte comunica non solo attraverso lo spazio, ma anche attraverso il tempo...la sensazione comincia dove la percezione cambia: di qui la necessità del viaggio...
Primi passi nei club nei primi '00, ma è dal 2008 che viene conosciuto dal grande pubblico capitolino grazie ad ANY GIVEN MONDAY, serata di punta del clubbing romano, di cui è organizzatore e dj resident.
"Coloro che danzavano erano considerati folli da quelli che non riuscivano a sentire la musica." (A.Monet)
___________________________________________________________

GIANNY'S present: 

MISS AGM SHOW with GIANNY' UNITED TEAM & DOUBLE L directed by GIANNY'S

Nel corso del dj set è prevista una mirabolante CIRCUS PERFORMANCE di INERZIA.ORG

GoMad Events, DeepBrass Prod. & Intergalactic Music are proud to announce the debut London show, and only London date of the European Spring Tour: 
ALBOROSIE & Shengen Clan LIVE 
at Electric Brixton on April 10th, 2014,

with support from: 

MR FASO (Rootikal) 
and
BRIXTON HEIGHTS Crew. 

The genesis of Sicilian-born Alberto D’Ascola, aka Alborosie, can be blamed on an elixir of fate, talent, technologiy and most of all, determination. Born and raised in Sicily, but now residing in Kingston, Jamaica, the multi-instrumentalist Alborosie’s music career began with forming his own band Reggae National Tickets (signed to BMG Italia), at the age of 15.
 
After multiple sold-out tours, the Italian artist with a Reggae pedigree decided to make a move to Jamaica to be close to reggae music's roots and Rastafari culture and begin his solo career.

In 2011, he became the first white artist to win a MOBO (Music of Black Origin) Award in the Best Reggae Act category.

After a successful tour throughout South America and Europe in 2013; performing on re-nowned stages such as Montreux Jazz Festival, Solidays, Garorock, Dour Festival, Summerjam, Rototom, to mention a few, Alborosie and his Jamaican backing band Shengen Clan have built a huge following worldwide and have shared the stage with some of the worlds biggest international Reggae artists.

Well-known for his unbelievable energy during live shows, Alborosie starts the year at top speed and is excited to be performing in the UK for the first time. 

To date, Alborosie has worked with credible artists such as Mario, Angie Stone, Jewel, Sisqo, No Doubt, Wyclef and Les Nubians.  He has also collaborated with All-stars Dean Frazer, Beenie Man, Lutan Fya and a number of other Jamaican artists. 

Mr. FASO (Rootikal) - www.mrfaso.com

BRIXTON HEIGHTS CREW - http://www.mixcloud.com/brixtonheights3/

Supported by THTC Eco Clothing - www.thtc.co.uk

This is strictly an 18 + show.

For any more info don't hesitate to write us on:
dario@goforwardevents.co.uk
giulio@goforwardevents.co.uk

631668913553856.description:
Looking forward to sharing with each and everyone of the dance and soon to be dance community!  House Dance allows for the socialization and the language of dance to be shared between friends, adversaries, strangers, enthusiasts, and dancers of many styles.  It trains and develops both a sense of dance vocabulary, but also body kinetics and alignment, power generation, control, inflection, emotional content, and variable timing and structure.  From contemporary dancer to hard core battle gladiator, the language of house dance applies to all.  

We will fire through a host of vocabulary, applications and variations.  Then we will apply them as per various situations, tactics and strategies.  Throughout we will develop understandings as to how the dance works and why we would make various movement choices and give a path to further exploration.  

All are welcome as we look forward to helping your dance story be told... leggo.

632942793450269.description:
KONKRETE JUNGLE FRIDAY NIGHT SPECIAL FEATURING DJ HEIST  - FIRST MINNEAPOLIS APPEARANCE!!!

HEIST (Playaz, Metalheadz, Sumo Beats)Established as a DJ for over 15 years, Heist started producing tracks 12 years ago. In That Time hes produced tracks on many labels, including Logan D's Low Down Deep, Goldie's Metal Headz, DJ Hype's Ganja Records, Mampi Swift's Charge Records, Roni Size's Full Cycle, Shy Fx's Digital Sound Boy, V Recordings, Philly Blunt, Frontline, Propaganda amongst others, along with his own imprints Sumo Beatz, Co-Lab & Calypso. Being Influenced by all styles of Drum & Bass from the start, Heist’s incredibly adaptable production style has seen his tunes find themselves into a variety of big name’s DJ boxes across the scene, together with the compliment of being sound engineer to Goldie’s productions (Also as Rufige Kru) for the last 6 years. Expertly balancing a long line of ambitious production projects with his first love of DJing, Heist continues to play out across the UK and Europe, America and Australia to an ever-increasing fan base.

In a welcome diversion from the antisocial Drum & Bass stereotype, Heist has also come into his own as a personality in the music owing to a volume of media coverage pushing him into the public consciousness.The Sumo Beatz Podcast (Available on iTunes) offers a great insight into the variety of what Heist plays in DJ Sets. Also an appearance in Drum & Bass literary Mecca Knowledge Magazine providing invaluable knowledge for their ‘Studio Tips’ section was followed by demand for his DJ work at competing publication ATM, laying down a mix with award-winning MC Funsta. Further publicity has seen him interviewed for Drum & Bass Arena TV from his very own studio, also DJing on Drum & Bass TV LIVE many times with people like Harry Shotta, Skibbadee, Funsta and others. Add to that appearances on BBC Radio 1, Ministry Of Sound, Kiss FM and BBC 1Xtra where he held his own alongside superstars Grooverider, Bryan G, DJ Hype and Bailey. With continual support from industry heavyweights including Fabio, Grooverider, Hype, Goldie, Fresh, Annie Mac, Mista Jam, Bailey, Crissy Criss, Dillinja, Original Sin, Taxman, Hazard and plenty more, Heist’s spot in the limelight has been deservedly cemented in recent times.

Heist has raised the bar over time with a number of exciting collaborations and re-workings, ever conscious of a desire to improve his own already formidable skills. These include a remixs for Roni Size, Pendulum, Talay Riley, Stooshe and Josh Kumra. Also Engineering Remixes alongside Goldie for Calvin Harris, Ed Sheeran, Joker and legendary Stone Roses front man, Ian Brown.Further work alongside Goldie has seen him engineer hugely well-received LPs Malice in Wonderland and Memoirs of an Afterlife for the Metalheadz boss, together with A Recent new Goldie Track Called 'Freedom' which was supported on BBC Radio 1 by Ferne Cotton, Pete Tong, Zane Low, Trevor Nelson, Mista Jam to name a few. Meanwhile, Heist has Also worked on Collaborations with artists like Taxman, Majistrate, Crissy Criss, Serum and many more with new possible co lab options looming.

https://twitter.com/JimHeist
http://www.discogs.com/artist/Heist

The Clique Project festival debut on Clapham Common this May at London's freshest festival concept.

Brought to you by Gigalum - Sub Audio Festival is the first of it's kind to hit the capital, an innovative experience which is set to change the landscape of festivals in the area. Gigalum are set to broaden the term 'Silent Disco' and flip the concept on it's very head with over 1,000 like minded revellers descending onto the Common creating the ultimate house party ever, but on Clapham Common.

Injecting those summer vibes, our residents join 70+ DJs on stage over the bank holiday weekend spinning nothing but real house music. DJs will beam their tunes to your ears using the power of special waves so you can choose between 3 different super-channels on your wireless headset...The future is now.

With art brought to you by the The Secret Garden Party you can expect the unexpected this May. Irregular pop-up experiences, unforeseen scenery and inexplicable shows, so come down early and absorb the atmosphere...Come Join The Clique.

Featuring

636108433087403.description:
AQUADANCE™ -WATER THERAPY is a soft meditative therapy in warm water to release your deepest unconscious tensions and to rejuvenate your body, mind, heart and spirit.

It helps you to relax greatly and to establish a new dimension of trust and intimacy in your relationships.

This is a perfect environment in which to dissolve fearful physical, mental or emotional tensions from as early as prenatal life. In the arms of a partner you gently get moved and almost weightlessly float into a space of deep let go.

It works to unwind and rebalance your nervous system and to open you for the magic experience of inner peace and harmony. You reconnect to your subconscious healing powers and to your origin in the ocean of life.

Working with Loving Touch and massage you receive what you have missed since the beginning of your life – a beautiful welcoming to existence. You can experience an extraordinary state of wellbeing - a state that you may have not met before.

4:45pm-7:30pm 
We'll all go out to dinner after the session. (optional)

Cost: £35 if paid on the day/£20 online booking/£15 concession 
http://www.meetup.com/london-ecstatic-dance/events/148598122/

The other date is December 14th.

Please bring a towel, bathing suit and bottle of water.

THE BARBERSHOP zu Gast zum 9jährigen LONDON CALLING Jubiläum! The Barbershop ist eine Party des Elektronischen Donnerstag-Projekts im SchwuZ! And we love this party!!!

A queer electronic ball to desymbolize and play with hair especially dedicated to transbears, cis-bears, chub women and hair fanatics of all sorts.
✄ Hair always defined gender in human history; beards and short hair as masculine, long hair and smooth faces as feminine. The biggest social and cultural revolutions appeared through new symbolizations of hair. Women were shaving their hair to refuse the power of men and men were growing hair as the feminine countercultural refusal of patriarchal societies. Last but not least growing beards happens to be the contemporary queer phenomenon to desymbolize masculine identities.

640577909317859.description:
After a whirlwind couple of year’s Gaby Moreno won the Latin Grammy for best new artist in November 2013. Born and raised in Guatemala, she started listening to blues, r&b and soul at a young age. Singers like Ella Fitzgerald, Nina Simone and Aretha Franklin inspired her to take on singing herself.

A little over 10 years ago, Gaby moved to Los Angeles, USA and after winning ”John Lennon Songwriting Contest” in 2006, she released her debut album Still The Unknown in 2008. Later that year she was asked to write the theme song for NBC’s “Parks and Recreation” (co-written with Vincent Jones), that was nominated for an Emmy Award. Latina Magazine acclaimed her ”Best New Latin Artist 2010″, and she was the support act for both Ani DiFranco’s and Tracy Chapman’s world tours in 2009 and 2010. Also in 2010, she participated in one of the most prestigious and long time rock festivals in Denmark, Roskilde, where she emotively sang in front of 17,000 people accompanied by the Youth Radio Symphony of Denmark, directed by the legendary pianist, composer, producer and Beach Boys collaborator Van Dyke Parks. The next year without any push or support from a label, her independently released second album llIustrated Songs reached #1 in sales on Latin Itunes and Amazon Latin. That led her to many concerts in the U.S. and Europe.

In 2012, Gaby Moreno entered into the Latin-American music scene, thanks to the invitation extended by her fellow countryman and one of the most successful Latin American artists of all time, Ricardo Arjona, to record the duet “Fuiste Tu”. The song won wide approval with a Latin audience as well as two Latin Grammy nominations for “Song of The Year” and “Recording Of The Year”. Subsequently Gaby released her third album Postales which retains the same swing as her previous records but is sung completely in Spanish.

In 2013, she recorded a duet with Hugh Laurie, for his new album Didn’t It Rain, a cover of the popular song “Kiss Of Fire” and Gaby has been touring the world with Hugh Laurie and the Copper Bottom Band.

“The Guatemalan songwriter Gaby Moreno plucked ragtimey syncopations on a well-worn acoustic guitar, and let loose a tangy, bluesy voice with the feistiness of Édith Piaf.”- NY Times

“Moreno’s breathtaking voice is passionate and stylistically malleable, as she glides back and forth easily between bossa nova and bluesy rock.”- NPR Tiny Desk

“Gaby Moreno’s soulful vocals and ability to switch languages and genres have made her a rising star.” – NPR All Things Considered

Tickets £15 plus booking fee
