713525215325071.description:
**TICKETS ON SALE FRIDAY 29TH NOVEMBER 2013 AT THIS LINK: http://www.alt-tickets.co.uk/alttickets/home_peter_hook_and_the_light.html**

Peter Hook And The Light Announce First Ever Concerts Of New Order's 'Low Life' (1985) & 'Brotherhood' (1986) with special Manchester & London shows, September 2014...

Concerts to feature all material 1983 - 1987...

"From Confusion To True Faith"

"This is New Order reinvigorated, reenergized; Hooky has arguably reclaimed the songs and is delivering them with heart and soul." - Louder Than War

DHP in association with the Agency Group presents Peter Hook & The Light performing New Order's 'Low Life' and 'Brotherhood' live:

Thursday 25th September 2014	
The Ritz, Manchester
Tickets: £23.50 including charity donation

Saturday 27th September 2014
Shepherd's Bush Empire, London
Tickets: £26.50 including charity donation

Tickets for both concerts on general sale from 9am Friday 29th November 2013 at http://www.alt-tickets.co.uk/alttickets/home_peter_hook.html & Ticketweb www.ticketweb.co.uk

Tickets include charity donation to MIND & Nordoff Robbins Music Therapy 

Peter Hook & The Light have announced they are to perform New Order’s third and fourth albums, “Low Life” and “Brotherhood” for the first time with two special concerts. 

The Ritz, Manchester Thurs 25th Sept 2014.
Shepherds Bush Empire, London, Sat 27th Sept 2014.

Following on from The Light’s very well received Joy Division album shows and their equally praised tours of “Movement” and “Power, Corruption & Lies” the concerts will include the singles and B-sides from New Order’s most prolific period. From August 1983 up to 1987, taking the audience from “Confusion” to “True Faith”, with both “Low Life” and “Brotherhood” performed in full alongside all the other tracks from that fans consider New Order’s greatest period including “Thieves Like Us” “Bizarre Love Triangle”, “The Perfect Kiss” and many more.

Having released “Blue Monday” and “Temptation”, the band had grown in confidence and attained increasing success in the UK and internationally. Praised for their creativity,  boundary pushing and consistent touring, the albums saw the group finding their niche and signature sound. Fusing their rock, indie style with new emerging electronic equipment and bringing melody and emotion to their techno experiments. Both the singles and the albums for this period stand out as some of the finest work ever produced by the band.

Marking the high period of New Order artistically, the critical plaudits heaped upon “Power, Corruption & Lies” was followed by similar notices for “Low Life” and “Brotherhood”, considered as a trio, the band’s greatest albums which were achieved through a period of intense hard work which brought significant results and advancements. Having raised their profile with “Blue Monday”, still the biggest ever selling 12” in history, the band continued to define their status with their diffident attitude to promotion, Peter Saville’s iconic design and their disregard of mid Eighties video culture and the MTV generation.

With FAC 51 The Hacienda Club open in Manchester, the band decamped to New York in 1983 to work with Arthur Baker, who co-wrote and produced the first two singles from the period “Confusion" and "Thieves Like Us".

Arthur famously dance floor tested "Confusion" prior to release in ‘The Fun House’, one of New York's most famous underground clubs where the video was later filmed. The subsequent single became many fan’s favourite record, the effortless, timeless shimmering beauty of “Thieves Like Us”.

Releasing “Low Life” in 1985 alongside epic single “The Perfect Kiss”, whose 9 minute 12 inch mix, full of peaks and troughs is considered one of the best of the decade. The romantic club sounds of Low Life and its playful sense of humour has made many regard it as New Order’s most complete single album. Aside from the singles, the album contains many great records that have entered the canon, including “This Time Of Night”, “Sunrise”, “Elegia”, “Sooner Than You Think”, and the album’s closer “Face Up”, an energetic and euphoric club track.

With the band now signed to Quincy Jones’ Qwest label in the States, they began to tour internationally to ever increasing capacities. Their transatlantic success underlined by the appearance of songs “Elegia” “Thieves Like Us” and “Shellshock” on John Hughes “Pretty In Pink” Film Soundtrack in 1986, as well as the uniquely stylised videos which accompanied the singles.
Coupling the release of “State Of The Nation” to “Brotherhood” in September 1986, the first single was superseded by the band’s biggest international hit since 1983, the anthemic musical landmark “Bizarre Love Triangle” which broke the band fully through to North American, international and even Australian audiences.

“Brotherhood” itself took a unique approach, splitting the rock side of the band to the first side of the album, with tracks “Paradise”, “As It Is When It Was” and “Way Of Life”, whereas the flips side was electronic, taking in the two singles and also “Every Second Counts”, a finely tuned electronic ballad regarded as the counterpoint to “Power, Corruption & Lies” “Leave Me Alone”
With The Light’s concerts running up to 1987, (when New Order’s best-selling album “Substance”, a compilation of all the singles and B-sides was released, reportedly so Tony Wilson could play them in his new in car CD) New Order enjoyed their biggest international hit “True Faith”. Some seven years after the demise of Joy Division and a decade on from first forming, the band had come full circle to hit heights never thought possible, showing that “Dreams Never End”.  

With a set list so full of classic records and fans favourites, many never heard for some twenty five years or more, this music defined the times and still sounds current today.
Peter Hook & The Light’s “Lowlife” & “Brotherhood” concerts chart New Order’s final stage of evolution from the post punk of Joy Division to defining themselves as electro pop pioneers at the cutting edge of the emerging club scene in the mid to late Eighties.

The Light will also be supporting themselves at the concerts performing a selection of Joy Division material.

As with the previous debut album concerts by The Light, both gigs benefit two charities, Mind, the mental health charity and Nordoff Robbins Music Therapy.

For videos and concert footage from The Light check -www.youtube.com/peterhookandthelight 
www.peterhook.co.uk / www.facebook.com/peterhookandthelight

On “Low Life”

"Realigned as New Order, they successfully adapted their trauma to the dance floor, where their deviant fusion of black-funk rhythm tricks and English avant-punk had resulted in stunning club hits like "Temptation" and "Blue Monday." Low-Life, the group's third album, caps its long, methodical glide into pop's mainstream. "Love Vigilantes" and "The Perfect Kiss" both take full advantage of the remix lessons New Order learned under Arthur Baker, who produced its 1984 single "Confusion." On Low-Life, New Order made the most of accessibility without compromising their past." Rolling Stone 

On “Brotherhood”

"Brotherhood is the last of the ‘old-guard’ of New Order albums but not their last good album. It contains the most complete synthesis of the band’s sound, which only really diverged after that point. The galloping, tinny riffage, the skittering hi-hats, the sunburst of keyboard swells, the melodies picked out on bass . . . They also cast off the last remaining traces of Joy Division here – Peter Hook says goodbye to his past on ‘As It Is When It Was’ with a cheeky little riff from ‘Love Will Tear Us Apart’." The Quietus

On Peter Hook And The Light Live 

“Not only did Hooky and his band open the show with Joy Division songs, he proceeded to play New Order’s two full albums and a stellar encore....Hooky and his band really put 110% into this show.” LA Record

 “Say what you will about Peter Hook, the man has got balls….It was most enjoyable to revisit these albums….for those in the audience who had been too young or not even born when these albums were released, this was clearly a welcome opportunity to get the flavour of these musical riches in concert.” The Times

“Taking in the show, I could imagine that this is what it might have felt like hearing the original New Order playing that material back in the day.  More organic and authentic to the time. I really, really enjoyed this show immensely.” Rock Subculture

"Now, 30 years later, the songs really come to life with a punchier musical delivery than they ever had on record, and an uber-confident Hook belting them out. The most fascinating thing about the gig is hearing the journey between Joy Division and the classic New Order sound over the course of two hours." Artrocker

 “Hooky is the Rock God of bass players. His performance at North London’s Koko had far more energy than last summer’s Hyde Park show by the rest of New Order. He closed with a triumphant Temptation and the inevitable encore of Blue Monday. You've still got it, Hooky.” The Sun

“The show was an unquestionable treat for fans....Hooky is an outstanding bass player and it's truly magical to see him live in action.....Don't miss this tour if it's coming to your city.  Peter Hook is a legend.” Hang The DJ / x89 Radio

“Best decision I made all year? Quite possibly.... My god, man. Go see this band.... Well played, Mr. Hook. Well played.” The Pale Drummer

 “There was never any doubt that this gig by the New Order legend and his new band was to be something quite extraordinary... Hooky’s bouncing, bending stage presence give this whole performance the urgency and, aptly, movement that it might be said is lacking in the ‘other’ New Order’s live performances of the past year.” Manchester Evening News

 “What Hooky has done is grab these songs by the scruff of the neck and give them a punkiness with his bass driving the songs with an added raw power. Tonight is a real triumph - everything was perfect from the venue, to the acoustics, to the delivery of the songs, to the tight band, to the vocals and that distinctive great bass playing...Hooky has made these songs have a very different narrative and put a whole new heart and soul into them.” Louder Than War

About Peter Hook And The Light 

Peter Hook And The Light features Peter Hook on vocals and bass, Jack Bates on bass, David Potts on guitar, Andy Poole on keyboards and Paul Kehoe on drums. Having first performed the Joy Division albums in 2010, the band have continued to perform all of the Joy Division catalogue and have recently completed tours of North and South America and the UK and Ireland performing "Movement" and "Power Corruption And Lies". Plans for 2014 include European and Far East dates including the band's first ever visit to China and festival appearances prior to the first "Low Life" and "Brotherhood" shows in September.
713525215325071.name: O2 Shepherd's Bush Empire, London, UK - Peter Hook & The Light perform New Order's 'Low Life' and 'Brotherhood' live plus opening Joy Division set.

QUESTO LUNEDI SI CELEBRERA' LA TERRA D'ALBIONE ED IN PARTICOLARE LA CAPITALE, LONDRA.

Nel campo della musica moderna, Londra ha visto la formazione di importanti band e alcune tra le migliori di sempre, tra cui: One Direction, Pink Floyd, Genesis, Yes, Queen, The Who, Iron Maiden, Coldplay, The Clash, Sex Pistols, Rolling Stones e Duran Duran. Sono inoltre nati nella città i cantautori Amy Winehouse e David Bowie, mentre Freddie Mercury vi ha a lungo vissuto.

Il lunedì a Barcellona, Londra, Berlino, San Francisco e in molte altre città non è un giorno come gli altri. Accantonati i monotoni impegni e le incombenze dell’inizio, tutti si ritrovano e si perdono nella notte più esclusiva della settimana. La Night Life romana è finalmente competitiva nella scena off mondiale grazie a VEGA e al suo ANY GIVEN MONDAY. Un lunedì per pochi. Scorretto, insolito, non convenzionale, caratterizzato dalle esuberanti sonorità vintage dell’indie-rock e dalle afose rotondità dell’electro. Qualcuno dica a Bob Geldof che ormai “I don’t like mondays” è un’affermazione superata.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY si discosta, sia esteticamente che concettualmente, dai canoni usuali del divertimento notturno. È un format-party “glocale” che importa elementi esterofili all’avanguardia, personalizzandoli notevolmente, e riadattandoli alla realtà off capitolina.

È una festa MADE AT HOME, spiazzante per la sua diversità, dove l’imperativo non è apparire, ma divertirsi. È un happening, un carnevale perenne, è musica, teatro, danza, arte, moda, video, televisione, avanspettacolo e molto, ma molto di più, del prodotto che si ottiene moltiplicando tutti questi fattori tra di loro. È un posto incantato, fuori dal tempo e dallo spazio, veramente FREE e OPEN. È un contenitore difficile da descrivere dove c’è tutto e il contrario di tutto, sempre uguale ma in continuo mutamento.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è un party dall’animo sensibile, il vestito vintage, l’aspetto kitsch e il cuore naif, con uno sguardo avanguardistico e una straordinaria capacità di prendersi in giro e prendere in giro una città tanto seria come Roma. È controcorrente e retrò, ma sempre contemporaneo e attuale, pieno di vizi e stravaganze.

È stato indubbiamente la pluripremiata novità degli ultimi anni, definito da molti addetti ai lavori un “asso piglia tutto che non può non piacere”, aristocratico e popolare, raffinato e cafone, fa delle sue contraddizioni e delle sue divergenze il suo più grande pregio. All’AGM ci sono tutti! Gente di ogni tipo: persone diversissime tra di loro e di tutte le parti del mondo che magicamente ballano, saltano e si divertono insieme.

Il suo essere off e casalingo è diventato in breve tempo di massa, la sua irruzione nel panorama della night life romana è stata come quella di un uragano, che ha cambiato le regole del gioco, spazzando via consuetudini decennali e modificando il concetto stesso di divertimento. Per questi e mille altri motivi l’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è già mito, ma nonostante tutto rimane quello che è sempre stato: un party controcorrente e all’occasione contro anche se stesso, una festicciola tra amici nel salone di casa dove ognuno porta qualche cosa e ci si ritrova a conoscersi tutti.

L’AGM oggi piu' che mai rimane MADE AT HOME, OFF, CHEAP e OPEN rappresentando in festa l’essenza stessa del lunedì. L’AGM è un posto magico: la casa di tutti e il party di tutti nato sotto la buona stella di VEGA, custodito dai dentoni del giaguaro e abitato da sempre nuovi e strabilianti personaggi in cerca d’autore.

Who is Donny & Nathalie???

Donny and Nathalie - Players of the Week DONNY & NATHALIE Since two years, Donny and Nathalie have been holding the title of best UK Kizomba competitors and came 1ST at the 2011 and 2012 UK Kizomba Championship. Donny and Nathalie were proud to represent the UK at ÁfricAdançar (the International Championship of Kizomba), in Lisbon on 10 April 2011 and on 29 April 2012. Their professional level have been rewarded by a nice and deserved 3rd place, classifying her in the top 3 couples on the International Kizomba scene in 2012. Becoming talented artists, Donny and Nathalie have also found another way to pass on her talent by teaching. As a rising star of Kizomba in the UK, Donny and Nathalie have performed and taught in different events in the UK but also In France ,Sweden, Spain , Switzerland, Germany , Portugal , USA and Malta. In 2012 , Donny and Nathalie, were chosen to participate at a british National TV Show : GOT TO DANCE. This amazing experience of dancing Kizomba on TV was one of their best achievement. In 2013 Donny and Nathalie were invited of being part of the Jury of the Africadancar Competition in London. The Kizomba is now the real Passion of Donny and Nathalie. Within 3 years, They have learnt how to dance , perform , teach , spead the love of the dance and they have been choreographing thier own dance shows ( with music selections , themes, and costumes designs).

THE TRANNYSHACK BALL –with an all star line up as seen on DRAG QUEENS OF LONDON 
THE BLOOMSBURY BALLROOM Sat May 24th 2014 .
TRANNYSHACK UK is delighted to unleash yet another totally unique night for your delectation. This is the one you have all been waiting for. Come and meet the girls from the London Live TV show "Drag Queens of London" and our very own TRANNYSHACK - ACADEMY and see them give unique vignette performances highlighting their own special and fabulous talents. Directed by DQOL star ROSIE BEAVER and choreographed by Trannyshack Academy's ferocious and fierce RAVEN MANDELLA . This drag extravaganza is set in the sumptuous and decadent setting of the stunning BLOOMSBURY BALLROOM.
Hosted by The Very Miss DUSTY O. DJ's - Lady Lloyd and Tasty Tim. Full show line up to be announced shortly but expect it to be BIG , BRASSY and BOLD with as many of the TV show girls as you can throw an eyelash at plus MORE.
Trannyshack UK is one of London’s most popular avante-garde cabaret club nights. Every Wednesday for nearly a decade this award-winning party welcomes fabulous drag queens, gender illusionists, dressed-up Klub Kids, transexuals, faces-about-town, and a host of other wild creatures channeling glamorous polysexuality! 
If you don’t know it, you won’t hear it played by the DJs at Trannyshack - where the emphasis is on fun! Expect music from every decade in a mad, mixed up mash up from London’s best Drag DJ’s. Interspersed with impromptu shows from the TRANNYSHACK GIRLS themselves.
Our new monthly Ball at The Bloomsbury Ballroom is a dressed up, fun and spectacular event featuring the creme de la creme of the London Drag Scene .As Leigh Bowery said in 1985: "Dress as though your life depends on it or don't bother …" 
Find out more about Trannyshack at www.trannyshacklondon.com

715221408509064.description:
Promised Land
Respect your history 

Bank holiday Sunday 20th April 
@Egg Club 200 York Way kings Cross London N7 9AX
4pm - 8am

Promised Land is back Easter Sunday @ EGG London and for this the 1st bank holiday of 2014, you need look no further to satisfy your bank holiday partying appetite, from the early 80s playing in the garden from 4pm with our legendary all day BBQ to the basement terrace loft and apothecary taking very good care of all your musical tastes. In the basement we are very proud to welcome Danny Rampling one of the original founders of London's club scene Danny's carer started in the early 80s playing hip hop/soul and funk around numerous clubs in London, during a holiday in Ibiza in 1987 Danny along side fellow Djs Paul Oakenfold and Nicky Hollaway attended Amnesia At this club the group were introduced to the unique eclectic style of DJ Alfredo playing the new house music sound from Chicago,  Upon his return to England, Rampling, attempted to recreate the Ibizan experience by promoting what is regarded as the UK's first Balearic rave club SHOOM this was definitely a launching point for the acid house scene and is why we have him live for you for an exclusive 2 hour set !!

DJ Alfredo the Ibiza legend live on the night for the first time ever at Promised Land, Mr Amnesia himself the father of Balearic Beat.

Nicky Holloway one of the famous Ibiza four and a firm Promised Land favourite. In April 1990, he opened the Milk Bar venue at 12 Sutton Row, London, It hosted Paul Oakenfold on Friday nights and pete tong and Dave Dorrell on Saturday nights, Darren Emerson on Mondays, Danny Rampling's Pure Sexy and Glam on Wednesday and in the later years Richard 'The Hobbit' Bamford, Brandon Block and Lisa Loud playing FUBAR on the Sunday night. David Morales, Tony Humphries , the Brand New Heavies and Jamiroquai got signed after doing spots at this legendary club!!! We also welcome for the first time ever at Promised Land & Egg London Unique 3 who have been on the razors edge of dance music since its inception forever etched into warehouse legend with his pioneering of bleep house with the monster track The Theme. Unique 3 was instrumental in involving house music beyond its roots and has been cited by such people as The chemical brothers Cold cut Goldie and LFO. 

On The Terrace representing the up front sound of today we are very please to invite Eat sleep rave repeat Riva Starr for a 2 hr set along with our on point resident DJ's spinning the freshest upfront sounds from the underground

In the Apothecary with its own gorgeous self contained garden area will take you back to the golden years of raving 1991 – 1994 With The Ratpack The kings of the Oldskool and are immortalised in clubbing history thanks to rave anthem 'Searching' For My Rizla.' 
Along side DJ Slipmatt a hardcore legend!!!!!
His first music production was in 1989 where Slipmatt collaborated with DJ Lime forming SL2. The single "Do That Dance", was released in that same year. This was followed by the number 11 UK chart hit "DJs Take Control" / "Way In My Brain". The follow-up single "On a Ragga Tip", reached number 2 in April 1992. As a result of their chart success, the band were propelled into the media spotlight and made appearances on Top Of The Pops and other television shows. SL2's chart success continued with a remix of "Way in My Brain", which made the top twenty in the UK chart.

In the loft WE GET FUNKY 1994-2007 with our very carefully hand picked Djs that no all about the golden years of the classic funky house & Garage.

Egg club has under gone some great refurbishment that has made the club Bigger And Better !!! We kick things off with the day time BBQ playing 80s & 90s classics in the garden from 4pm this is surely the only way to spend your well deserved bank holiday weekends. Come and join us for this 4 part epic all day & all night party that will put a smile on your face and make you think you are back in your golden years!!
16 hours of the very best partying, getting lost on the dance floor, talking cod shit to strangers hands in the air fun!! Cant wait to see all our brothers and sisters for our yearly gathering at The Promised Land.....

715701871776678.description:
Uprisin' brings to you a special night of the finest in American and UK based Rockabilly this evening with the fantastic Delta Bombers from California USA signed to cult Rockabilly label, Wild Records. Along with the fantastic UK based Sixteen & The Sidewinders who have been wowing London audiences with their unique and frantic brand of rock'n'roll. 

As well as these fantastic artists we also have the superb DJ stylings of London's very own Cosmic Keith (Ex-Boston Arms, Typical British Workmanship, Whip It On Me) who will be playing the very best selection of rock'n'roll, garage and rhythm'n'blues your ears have ever heard! Plus your host DJ Danny 'O' will be on hand spinning wax until 2am for a no hold barred, 45rpm only spin-off! 

LONDON EXCLUSIVE SHOW, ONE NIGHT ONLY: Delta Bombers, USA, Wild Records:
The Delta Bombers have smashed stages all over the world, playing a hybird of 50’s rock and roll fused with blues, and the most exciting elements of rockabilly. These stages include major Rockabilly festivals such as The High Rockabilly and Viva Las Vegas, as well as many other rockin’ shows in Europe. Driven by their two full length albums Howlin’ (2009) and Wolf (2012) The Delta Bombers seek to push their sound ever further as they travel farther and faster and write and record deeper music. 
http://wildpresents.com/delta-bombers

Sixteen & The Sidewinders, UK:
Sixteen put the Sidewinders together in spring 2012 with the powerhouse slap bass of Phil Polecat (The Polecats), and the infectious rhythms of Jonny Drums to capture the wild side of the 50's beat with raw, raunchy rockabilly that'll get your feet and hips moving!
Sixteen talent that has found him collaborating with the likes of Glen Matlock (Sex Pistols), Guy Pratt (Pink Floyd), and the almighty Wilko Johnson (Dr Feelgood) which goes only part of the way to give you an idea of how great these guys are!
http://www.sixteenandthesidewinders.moonfruit.com/

719709014747872.description:
Questo giovedì torna LONDON VINYL PROJECT, il nostro aperitivo dedicato alla promozione e diffusione della musica in vinile.

L'appuntamento di questa settimana assume le vesti di una versione SPECIAL EDITION, che vedrà la partecipazione del brand I'm Not a Chinese Product e del suo Founder nonché, Art Director, Mr.Doddo D'Ambrosio che si esprimerà in una live performance d'eccezione, miscelando sapientemente arte, moda e musica.

Bei AUA wird der Berner Autor und Performer Diego Häberli das ursprüngliche Experiment von PURGE von Brian Lobel (https://www.facebook.com/events/619933301418573/?fref=ts) in einer Installation in der Turnhalle mit seinen eigenen Facebook-Freunden und -Freundinnen durchführen. Vom 8. bis 10. Mai erzählt er Ihnen täglich von 13 Uhr bis 21 Uhr über sein Facebook-Umfeld – pro Beziehung eine Minute. Sie entscheiden mit, welche von seinen Freundschaften er kündigen soll. 

Diego Häberli tritt seit 2008 auf Slam-Poetry-Bühnen im gesamten deutschen Sprachraum auf. Ausserdem war er als Tänzer und Performer in mehreren Produktionen in Schaffhausen und Bern zu sehen, u.a. bei der Jungen Bühne Bern, bei Marcel Leemann und in eigenen Produktionen.

mit: Diego Häberli | Konzept: Brian Lobel

725301524181159.description:
Please Click Here & Donate To Make A Difference Every Penny Counts 
http://uk.virginmoneygiving.com/fundraiser-web/fundraiser/showFundraiserProfilePage.action?userUrl=ManjinderRaiyat

Send A FREE Text To 70070 Quoting MANJ90 Followed By 5 For A Suggested Minimum Donation Of £5

After years of praying... hoping... and wishing NOT to get a place in the London Marathon, the powers that be finally caught up with me and said 'RAIYAT its your turn this year - No excuses!'  So here I am raising money and awareness for two charities very close to my heart:

MIND:  They provide advice and support to empower anyone experiencing a mental health problem. They campaign to improve services, raise awareness and promote understanding.

ALZHEIMER'S SOCIETY:  Leading the fight against dementia. They work hard to improve the quality of life of people affected by dementia as well as providing much needed support and guidance to families.

My beautiful nan passed away from Alzheimer's.  She was an amazing, loving person with the biggest heart in the world!  I am running this year in honor of her memory and in the process hoping to raise awareness of dementia and mental illness so that we can spot the signs earlier and seek help - Forgetting where you put your dentures may not just be a sign of old age!  

I really appreciate all your support and thank you for any donations.  Please gift aid on a charity's behalf where eligible for this.

See you at the finishing line!

Much love Manjinder! xxxxx

Many Thanks

Xclusive PR
725301524181159.name: Manjinder Raiyat's London Marathon Challenge In Aid Of ALZHEIMER'S SOCIETY & MIND

725787794118173.description:
London, we're back!! After an exciting first party in the beautiful East London club 'Dalston Superstore', by popular demand we have decided to repeat ourselves.. Same location, same Italian and Greek djs plus a brand new female entry from Spain, MartAloe, who's gonna open the night.
"We don't sync so" is back! Underground deep and tech house is our Bible. Vynils our God. Dalston Superstore is, again, our Church. Come to join us, You never wanna lose this one!

Lineup includes djs from Etruria Beat, the renowned Italian label owned by Luca Agnelli and Marco Faraone. To top it up, we'll have again the two djs from Greece who are based in London and who will add that extra shades of house and techno to our souls.  
Simply perfect!! Join us on Wednesday 9th April at Dalston Superstore' basement to party until the early hours!

LINE UP:

Toms:due - ITA
www.facebook.com/Tomsdue

A collective name that includes Edo Rinaldi and Christian Latronico, young DJs / producers. They appeared to be the most acclaimed animators of the house/techno scene in Modena, north of Italy. Mainly related to the experience of Gallery Club and The One, well-known parties in which they are residents.
In 2012 they started their cooperation with the Etruria Beat label, founded by Luca Agnelli and Marco Faraone. Their track "Part of It" was included in the "Bud Sampler" in 2013 received loads of feedbacks from international artists such as Dan Drastic, Satoshi Tomiie, James Zabiela, Tobi Neumann, Reset Robot, Re.You, Mauro Picotto and many more.

Bastinov - ITA
www.facebook.com/bastinov

Bastinov are Venetians - based Dj , begin with some singular experience in various clubs in the area of Treviso. Together they share a sonic vision that pulls together elements of house and techno melodic.
In September 2012 began to produce and play toghether with creating alias BASTINOV. 
At the end of July 2013 made their first release on the label ETRURIA BEAT Italian Luca Agnelli and Marco Faraone.

Little Charles - ITA
www.facebook.com/pages/Little-charles/1398759277005112

Charles Tagliaferri aka Little Charles , Dj/Producer, Radio Host, passionate of jazz music, fusion, drum and bass and of course everything related to the world of the night... His sets are a continual exploration of sound and rhythm, creating a deep groove, perfect for the dancefloor vinyl collector and lover of his sound in the most unrestrained, made his debut in the world of production thanks to Etruria Beat with the songs from the groove-and it sees the sun also a singer with an unusual beat for the label but that describes perfectly the vision varied and open to new sounds of the artist.

D'Jones - GR

In his early high school years,when he discovered deeper emotions and passion for the underground scene he found his interest.Mainly reason was the first contact with his fathers an abandoned turntable (full of dust) which he found it in the storage.
After fixing it, he started listening couple of records that his father owned (disco,soul, funk, etc.)
Ioannis Dimakis aka D'Jones recently moved to London.
His sound is influenced from House,Detroit and Chicago tunes.He started collecting records and his music style with the passage of time evolved.

Nikats - GR

MartAloe - ES

INFOs & CONTACTs :

wedontsyncso@gmail.com

LONDON MASSIVE x UK Beats Night

muzyka: DRUM'N'BASS, JUNGLE, DUBSTEP, GARAGE
djs: PATOLOGIC & ROOTSHOT [Dope Worx Crew]


To nie fusy z herby Cejlon,
to powrót London Massive!

Earl grey i Yunnan zaparzcie babci i wpadajcie do Indecksu na noc akustycznej degustacji.
Lipton odpada, Saga niech się w szafce schowa.
W prawdzie opis o herbacie i mało kto wie o co chodzi,ale skoro to sobota, to wszystko jasne.
Energii doda wam mesydż,że impreza w klimacie jungle, dubstep, garage i dnb.
Kto już był na London Massive ten wie z czym to się pije.
Jeszcze nie byliście?
Zapraszamy na muzyczną herbę z prądem!


bio:

ROOTSHOT [Dope Worx]
http://www.facebook.com/ROOTSH0T
http://soundcloud.com/root-shot
http://www.mixcloud.com/Rootshot/

Bez szablonu i schematu. Od Unitry po 15kW w pofabrycznych halach. Znany z różnorodności i doborowej selekcji. W zależności od klimatu imprezy jest brygadą remontową lub remontem anastezjologów. W jego setach muzyka zmienia się w czystą euforię i ADHD dozowane bezpośrednio do mózgu lub trip po chillowym mikrokosmosie. Zdolność obsługi Excela z kontrolera midi oraz niebanalna selekta zaprowadziła go na niejeden rave/bankiet/peklaż/after/parkiet (niepotrzebnie skreślić). Często supportuje tuzów sceny. Grał z Aphrodite, Serial Killaz, Jacky Murda, FFF, Chosen Few, I:Gor, Cooh, Forbidden Society, Son of Kick, Culture Shock, Radikal Guru, Xilent, Matt Green, J:Kenzo, Raxyor, Aries, Zomboy, Document One, Lion Fire, Lenzman, Gemini, The Jilionaire. Najczęściej pojawia się tam,gdzie tętni masywny drum&bass, jungle, hardcore,albo garage i dubstep,ale skrycie marzy o puszczaniu gabberów na studniówce.

PATOLOGIC [Dope Worx]
http://www.mixcloud.com/PatoLogic/

Rave, big beat, breaks płynie w jego żyłach, ale najszybszy puls przybiera w postaci dnb i jungle. Miesza wszystko co połamane i taneczne. Przyjdź, zobacz i poczuj klimat jaki tylko on potrafi
stworzyć!

We encourage Polish, Romanians, Bulgarian communities, black, white, LGBT people and all who UKIP have targeted, to join us in a celebration of multi racial Britain.

UKIP is a racist, far right party that loves the rich - and it's after our votes. Let's not be used by Ukip. Let's tell Farage that we will not fall for his phoney, 'man of the people', pose.
UKIP's blaming of migrant workers for the economic crisis is unnacceptable. Their racist scapegoating needs resisting. It isn't immigrants who have shut down major workplaces, closed hospitals or sent our bills soaring.

731134183580984.description:
The London Easter Carnival @ Shaka- Zulu - 4am Finish 

Celebrate this Easter weekend in style!

Love London PR have pulled out all the stops to bring you an unforgettable night this coming Easter Sunday 20th April 2014. Join us for "The London Easter Carnival" at London's breathtaking Shaka- Zulu, Camden! A night with 900 party goers across 2 level's of the finest in House, RnB & Club Classics

This year we bring you a night in Rio De Janeiro. Recreating the atmosphere, style, entertainment of that of an authentic original Brazilian street party, we offer you a never seen before experience this Easter Sunday!

Love London PR presents "The London Easter Carnival". With Live Bongo & Steel Pan acoustics to accompany our resident DJ's and entertainers of the night Love London PR has spared no expense and takes great care in delivering you the ultimate Easter satisfactory experience. 

Expect Brazlian & Flamingo Street dancers, Carnival themed Hostesses & Waiters, Carnival Masquerade, and much more all in the hustle and bustle of the Camden's famous Camden Market. 

All guests before midnight will be issued a complimentary Carnival Mask (Masqurade style) or optional face-painter for the theme. Get you ticket NOW and be a part of "The London Carnival" this East Sunday! An EPIC experience not to be missed!

• Shaka- Zulu - The Venue

Shaka Zulu is absolutely stunning and without doubt the most beautiful venue in London right now. With 60ft giant statues, meat flavored cocktails and a giant escalator taking you between floors it provides a totally unique clubbing experience. Prepare to be amazed as you move through the venue and marvel at the intricate detail captured on each carved wall and ceiling panel.

The design has earned Shaka Zulu numerous accolades including the prestigious prize of ‘best interior design’ at the London Club and Bar Awards 2012. Located in Stables Market in Camden and based over two floors, Shaka Zulu is the perfect place to let loose this Easter. Resident DJ's play the best of House, Funkyhouse Commercial Rnb and Club Classic This will prove to be the perfect solution for those of you seeking a slightly more unique, innovative experience outside the westend!

__________________________________________________________

ANY GIVEN MONDAY "I LOVE LONDON" @ QUBE

Lunedìì 7 Aprile presso QUBE, via di Portonaccio n. 212 (Roma)

INGRESSO 5€ + DRINK UNTIL 00.30
AFTER 5€

ONE SHOT ONE EURO UNTIL 24.00 - AFTER 3 SHOT X 5 EURO

QUESTO LUNEDI SI CELEBRERA' LA TERRA D'ALBIONE ED IN PARTICOLARE LA CAPITALE, LONDRA.

Nel campo della musica moderna, Londra ha visto la formazione di importanti band e alcune tra le migliori di sempre, tra cui: Pink Floyd, Genesis, Yes, Queen, The Who, Iron Maiden, Coldplay, The Clash, Sex Pistols, Rolling Stones e Duran Duran. Sono inoltre nati nella città i cantautori Amy Winehouse e David Bowie, mentre Freddie Mercury vi ha a lungo vissuto. 

E ALLORA MEMBERS, SCALDATE LE UGOLE, PRONTI A CANTARE :

I LOVE LONDON !!!

Hola. Me llamo Mimi .
I love London.
Ah-oh, ah-oh. Ah-oh, ah-oh... 
Ah-oh, ah-oh. Ah-oh, ah-oh. Ah-ah-ahah-oh. Oh.
I wanna go to the carpa
I wanna go to the carpa.
I wanna go to the carpa
I wanna go to carpa.
In Willesden!
Harlesden! 
Watford! 
Junction! Junction! Junction!
I love London.

PEACE, LOVE & ROCK 'N ROME!!!

* * * * *

Il lunedì a Barcellona, Londra, Berlino, San Francisco e in molte altre città non è un giorno come gli altri. Accantonati i monotoni impegni e le incombenze dell’inizio, tutti si ritrovano e si perdono nella notte più esclusiva della settimana. La Night Life romana è finalmente competitiva nella scena off mondiale grazie a VEGA e al suo ANY GIVEN MONDAY. Un lunedì per pochi. Scorretto, insolito, non convenzionale, caratterizzato dalle esuberanti sonorità vintage dell’indie-rock e dalle afose rotondità dell’electro. Qualcuno dica a Bob Geldof che ormai “I don’t like mondays” è un’affermazione superata.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY si discosta, sia esteticamente che concettualmente, dai canoni usuali del divertimento notturno. È un format-party “glocale” che importa elementi esterofili all’avanguardia, personalizzandoli notevolmente, e riadattandoli alla realtà off capitolina.

È una festa MADE AT HOME, spiazzante per la sua diversità, dove l’imperativo non è apparire, ma divertirsi. È un happening, un carnevale perenne, è musica, teatro, danza, arte, moda, video, televisione, avanspettacolo e molto, ma molto di più, del prodotto che si ottiene moltiplicando tutti questi fattori tra di loro. È un posto incantato, fuori dal tempo e dallo spazio, veramente FREE e OPEN. È un contenitore difficile da descrivere dove c’è tutto e il contrario di tutto, sempre uguale ma in continuo mutamento.

L’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è un party dall’animo sensibile, il vestito vintage, l’aspetto kitsch e il cuore naif, con uno sguardo avanguardistico e una straordinaria capacità di prendersi in giro e prendere in giro una città tanto seria come Roma. È controcorrente e retrò, ma sempre contemporaneo e attuale, pieno di vizi e stravaganze.

È stato indubbiamente la pluripremiata novità degli ultimi anni, definito da molti addetti ai lavori un “asso piglia tutto che non può non piacere”, aristocratico e popolare, raffinato e cafone, fa delle sue contraddizioni e delle sue divergenze il suo più grande pregio. All’AGM ci sono tutti! Gente di ogni tipo: persone diversissime tra di loro e di tutte le parti del mondo che magicamente ballano, saltano e si divertono insieme.

Il suo essere off e casalingo è diventato in breve tempo di massa, la sua irruzione nel panorama della night life romana è stata come quella di un uragano, che ha cambiato le regole del gioco, spazzando via consuetudini decennali e modificando il concetto stesso di divertimento. Per questi e mille altri motivi l’ANY GIVEN MONDAY è già mito, ma nonostante tutto rimane quello che è sempre stato: un party controcorrente e all’occasione contro anche se stesso, una festicciola tra amici nel salone di casa dove ognuno porta qualche cosa e ci si ritrova a conoscersi tutti.

L’AGM oggi piu' che mai rimane MADE AT HOME, OFF, CHEAP e OPEN rappresentando in festa l’essenza stessa del lunedì. L’AGM è un posto magico: la casa di tutti e il party di tutti nato sotto la buona stella di VEGA, custodito dai dentoni del giaguaro e abitato da sempre nuovi e strabilianti personaggi in cerca d’autore.

EDO PIETROGRANDE
I'm Edo Pietrogrande, audio engineer and architect.
Owner of till2012 records and loud & proud mastering studio, my career as dj started in 1998 when i was 15.
I've played in best venues around italy and Europe, Room 26, brancaleone, Goa club, magazzini Generali...
Now I'm working as producer for television and mastering engineer in my studio.
I'm also working for a booking agency and as always djing around Italy and sometimes Europe.
Never stop... Actually i'm the resident dj at room26 and Shari Vari club, Rome.
(www.till2012.com)
(https://soundcloud.com/edo-pietrogrande)

DISCOUNT
E' una mente esaltata che ha invertito il celebre precetto "la qualità è il miglior risparmio" con il più insolito "il risparmio è la migliore qualità". In virtù di questa anomala filosofia di vita è costretto a procurarsi musica solamente a prezzi stracciati. Le svendite di cd negli autogrill, le musicassette allegate nei giornali ed i dischi rubati da polverose soffitte sono trai suoi migliori metodi per poter allestire dei djset di un certo livello con pochi centesimi.
E state tranquilli il divertimento è garantito tutto a 0,99 €!
Soddisfatti o rimborsati...

MOKAI
Odia le catalogazioni, i compartimenti stagni, è un liberista, non si definisce dj, ma selezionatore. Il denominatore comune è il viaggio, e tutta l'arte che ne scaturisce. L'arte comunica non solo attraverso lo spazio, ma anche attraverso il tempo...la sensazione comincia dove la percezione cambia: di qui la necessità del viaggio...
Primi passi nei club nei primi '00, ma è dal 2008 che viene conosciuto dal grande pubblico capitolino grazie ad ANY GIVEN MONDAY, serata di punta del clubbing romano, di cui è organizzatore e dj resident.
"Coloro che danzavano erano considerati folli da quelli che non riuscivano a sentire la musica." (A.Monet)

Dates of shows:
Lab Art Invades Graffik Gallery: 3rd April - 17th April
Graffik Gallery Invades Lab Art LA: 24th April - 8th May



Concept:
The concept behind the two shows is to portray and expose the movement of urban art in two of the most significant markets for the genre.

Party Dates:
Lab Art Invades Graffik Gallery: 3rd April
Graffik Gallery Invades Lab Art: 24th April

Artist Names-
Lab Art Invades London At Graffik Gallery:

Louis xxx
Kai Aspire
Skyler Grey
MAR
MONCHO1929


Graffik Gallery Invades Los Angeles At Lab Art:

TRUST. iCON
Lucas Avalon
The Dotmasters
Robin Coleman
Christian Palmer
Aito

Idea behind the Show:
Graffik gallery and Lab art Los Angels are pleased to announce a unique collaboration never before seen. Both galleries are strongly embedded in what has been a surge in the street art movement; therefore, it was only about time they showcase their highly coveted artists, to regional audiences both in Britain and America.

Graffik and Lab Art are opening their doors for each other artists.
Displaying art from "across the pond"; LA will be able to experience the truly British movement of street art, whilst Graffik will be presenting LA’s finest urban artist in the hub of Britain’s street art district. This exciting exchange gives the audience an opportunity to experience and engage with street art that seems a thousand miles away, bringing regional superstars under one international roof.

"Get ready for the Invasion!”

Brit week tie up: Graffik’s Invasion in LA ties in nicely with the launch of Brit Week an organization that highlights the creative fusion between the United Kingdom and California. Brit Week host and publicly support a number of events open to the general public that focus on the British contribution to art, film, fashion, music, the automotive industry and science.

HAGGARD CAT BOTHDAY PRESENT
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
9.00

"An expectant crowd welcomed Haggard Cat Bothday Present to the stage. Haggard Cat is the side project of Baby Godzilla’s Matt Reynolds and Tom Marsh, playing whisky-fuelled blues rock.

This was a live performance of their recently recorded debut album Charger, including ten tracks of shouts, riffs and drums. Two men and two instruments making enough noise for a six-piece. Highlights of the set included Alligator Tightrope an ode to roaming with a relentless riff, and Gumblood Shuffle, performed with blood-curling screams and a marching drum beat.

Their set included no short amount of instrument swapping, chaos, and crowd-surfing that threatened to almost tear the intimate venue apart. Haggard Cat’s album is currently available online for absolutely nothing, but it’s worth so much more."
Graeme Smith - LeftLion

Tash and Chris have been nothing short of a best-kept-secret among New York City concertgoers since the band’s formation in 2008, building a fervent and dynamic fan base leveraged by their ever-substantiated reputation for consistently well-rehearsed and impassioned, explosive live performances. The band’s celebrated sound and spirit draws significant influence from the driving force of British rock pioneers Cream and Led Zeppelin, to billowing and bouncing funk and soul, to the layered harmonies and memorable hooks of The Beatles and The Hollies, to the contemporary psychedelia of My Morning Jacket among many more.

748058341876483.description:
Hi everyone, well, Tower Hamlets have decided to not give their approval to our event after months of preparation, writing health and safety/waste plans, security, we even had insurance from the MNDA. 
BUT saying that, I am still planning on going there to skate that day, and I hope as many of you as possible will join me. We wont have DJs this year, but I hope to get some sort of music playing and we can have a laugh and maybe even get a secret race going.....See you in August, even as just a way to remember our friend Tayaran Robinson . There are NO RULES about skating in the park so we are good to go, and if we can show Tower hamlets there is a market for this, then maybe we can do it bigger in 2015. see y'all soon.

749977665020659.description:
After the catastrophe of Bangladesh Rana Plaza (2013) is it right that the British fashion industry, worth over £21bn, still exploits millions of workers and refuses to change?

This event aims to educate people into what they are buying on the high street and how to encourage change. Over 30 Menswear and Womenswear designers and brands come together to showcase the very best of ethical fashion. There will be a stalls for browsing, café for networking and a panel discussion with 6 industry speakers:

•	Safia Minney Founder of People Tree
•	Lucy Siegle BBC One Show presenter, Ethical columnist for The Guardian and Observer
•	Ben Ramsden Founder of Pants to Poverty
•	Tamsin Lejeune Managing Director of Ethical Fashion Forum
•	Sam Maher Director of Policy and International Solidarity at Labour behind the Label
•	Kate Dangerfield Global campaigns and communications coordinator at Stop the Traffik

30 Brands/ Designers showcasing: 
Liora Lasselle, Choolips, People Tree, London Ethnic, Ruby Rocks, Mia by Mia Nisbit, Faye Donald, Nancy Dee, Jose Hendro, Betty and Betts, Jaded London, Komodo, Monkee Genes, Cock and Bull, Arther and Henry, Fair and True, Riz Boardshorts, Reborn, Brothers we stand, Run and Fell, Plane Clothing, Kitty Ferrira, Biblico, Mantis World, Allenomis, Partimi, Victim Fashion St, Junky Styling, Mayamiko, Katchabliek, fengo fashion and Rella.
Stalls: Lush, Body Shop, Rehema, Stop the Traffick, Fair Trade, Earths Heir, Pants to poverty, Milo et Mimi, Realm of treasure, Betty and Betts, Brothers we Stand and Run and fell.

Café space to network with hot canapés from signature SO. Also food from Krispy Cremes Doughnuts, Divine Chocolate and Nakd Bars. Selection of Wine, Beers, Schloer, sparkling and still water. 

Raffles Prizes: £50 meal voucher, Nathalie Bond Organics Candles, Wine, Jollies Socks, Artisan coffee with vouchers, Kitty Ferriera silk Headband, Lush products, Body Shop Products and Starbucks Hamper. 

Tickets are £10 or £7 with a valid student card – all tickets include a glass of wine/beer. 

Cause: This year all the proceeds will be going to Rehema project working with women who are living in extremely difficult situations in Africa, teaching them textiles skills, giving them an opportunity to provide for their families. Last year the show funded a workshop for Rehema, this allows the profits to supports the local community, ensuring basic food is provided to the schools, feeding over 500 orphans daily. In Tanzania 1 in 5 children die before the age of 5 due to preventable diseases contracted through dirty water, this show aims to buy 5 water wells for the community. Additional donations to the charity: https://mydonate.bt.com/fundraisers/rehema
749977665020659.name: London Ethical Fashion Show with Industry Speakers (In aid of Rehema)

753175784701323.description:
Sprache: Englisch
Spieldauer: 1h

«We’re born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we’re not alone.» (Orson Welles)

Kim Noble versucht Anschluss zu finden, irgendjemandem auf dieser Welt näher zu kommen. Dem Supermarktkassierer Keith zum Beispiel. Oder Ihnen vielleicht. In seinem Kampf gegen die Einsamkeit und auf seiner Suche nach Verbundenheit scheut das Enfant terrible der Britischen Performance- und Comedy-Szene keine Mittel. Schamlos nutzt er die Bedürfnisse anderer aus, um seiner eigenen Sehnsucht nachzukommen. «The braking of walls and barriers is a great proof of humanity», stellt er fest und bohrt kurzerhand ein Loch in die Wand, die ihn von den Nachbarn trennt. Minuziös führt er fortan Statistik über deren Sexleben, nur um ihnen etwas näher zu sein. Oder er putzt nachts alle parkierten Autos in seiner Strasse, weil er überzeugt ist, dass die Leute das verdient haben.
In der Show aus Handy-Videos, Chat-Protokollen, aufgezeichneten Telefongesprächen und intimen Erzählungen geht er genau dort noch ein Stück weiter, wo andere lieber schweigen. Schonungslos zieht er private Momente in die Öffentlichkeit der Bühne – und selbstverständlich macht er auch vor seinen eigenen Intimitäten keinen halt. Dass diese Skrupellosigkeit bloss die Auswirkung eines unbändigen Verlangens nach Nähe und der uferlosen Liebe für die Mitmenschen ist, macht YOU ARE NOT ALONE zu einem der berührendsten Theaterabende der letzten Jahre.

«Kim Noble is a genius» (Time Out)
«Just How annoying is Kim Noble?» (NY Times)

Mit seinem multidisziplinären Ansatz mischt Kim Noble in Grossbritannien auf Comedy-Bühnen, im TV und im Theater mit. Doch auch seine Video-Clips, Fotos und Aphorismen auf seiner Website (mrkimnoble.com) und auf Twitter oder sein Podcast sind eine Klasse für sich. Seine Arbeit nimmt mit viel Provokation und Humor die Lage der Menschheit zwischen Tod, Sexualität, Gender und Religion unter die Lupe – stets gespickt mit viel Absurdität.


Von und mit: Kim Noble | Ko-Regie: Gary Reich 

Koproduktion: In Between Time Bristol, Soho Theatre London

SO 11.5. | 18:00
MO 12.5. | 20:00 anschl. Publikumsgespräch
753175784701323.name: Kim Noble (London): You Are Not Alone

754886351210702.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://www.eventbrite.com/e/msc-london-bluf-pride-in-london-leatherrubber-march-tickets-9198722627?aff=efbevent

BLUF & MSC London will again be teaming up for this years Pride in London Parade - showing our Freedom to… wear leather and other fetish gear - so dig out your finest gear and come join the Parade.

Avi Angel - Mr Leather UK will be leading our marching group and we hope to have other title holders join us too.

The Parade is a procession of walking groups and floats which together march through streets in the heart of London to celebrate the LGBT+ community. It is one of the largest LGBT+ Parades in the UK and your chance to show lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people from all over the UK, Europe and further afield the very best that London has to offer. The aim of the Parade is to have fun, campaign and ultimately showcase the LGBT+ community in London, the UK and overseas.

When is the Parade and what time does it start?

The Parade takes place on Saturday 28 June 2014, commencing at 13:00.

What is the Parade’s route?

The Parade departs from Baker Street and the procession then follows this route:

1) Straight down Orchard Street

2) Turns left into Oxford Street and continues to Oxford Circus

3) Turns right into Regent Street and continues to Piccadilly Circus

4) Passing Eros, it then carries on down Lower Regent Street

5) Turns left into Pall Mall and continues round to Cockspur Street, passing the south side of Trafalgar Square

7) Round the roundabout into Whitehall.

The route is approximately just over two miles long. The route does not follow the normal traffic layout as the streets have been closed for Pride in London.

Where and when does the Parade finish?

The Parade finishes at Whitehall at approximately 16:30.

What is the theme for the Parade?

The theme for this year’s Parade is ’Freedom to…’. This can interpreted in any form that you like but we encourage you to to dress and decorate your float appropriately to represent your chosen subject.

Examples are ‘Freedom to marry’ or ‘Freedom to holiday’, there are countless options open to you and is the ideal opportunity to demonstrate how far we have travelled, the goals left to achieve and to celebrate the invaluable contribution that the LGBT+ community makes to London today.

Any other question please contact info@msclondon.co.uk or message via facebook or twitter @MSCLondon
754886351210702.name: MSC London & BLUF Pride in London - Leather/Rubber March

On Sunday 4th May 2014 the only way to shop retro returns to York Hall in Bethnal Green delivering up the chance to shop from the UK's largest Vintage wholesaler and buy your vintage by weight!!

We'll be bringing 5 TONNES of retro fashion to York Hall, menswear and womenswear will be laid out on rails and in rummage boxes. You simply select whatever you like, take it to the weigh station and pay at £15 per kilo - that's around 4 - 5 items!!

Ooh and we accept cash and credit / debit cards!

PRIVATE TRADE ENTRY: 9:45am
EARLY BIRD GENERAL PUBLIC: 10:15am £3.00
PUBLIC ENTRY: 11:00am £1.00
SALE CLOSES AT 16:00

So, what on earth are we banging on about? Well, here are a few very good reasons to cancel your other plans...

1) IT'S EXCLUSIVE! Ran by us boffins at Judy's Affordable Vintage Fair, we partner up with Europe's BIGGEST vintage wholesaler to bring you 5 TONNES of stock! Laid out before you and waiting to be shopped, we're talking everything from retro tees to denim, jackets to jumpers to shorts and skirts. Featuring ladies and gents fashion and accessories from the 1970s and on, we don't disappoint.

2) It's SO FRIKKIN' CHEAP! After trying on, parading and hoarding your items, take them to our weighing desk where you will be charged a meagre £15 A KILO! But what does that mean? Well, it depends on the item's weight but that's an average of 4 - 5 ITEMS FOR £15! No better place to shop affordable vintage in a BIG way, throw away your clothes, come get a new wardrobe and still have money left over.

3) WE GOT ACCESSORIES! Calling all magpies, your dream date has arrived! Britain's BIGGEST vintage jewellery buff VICTORIA VINTAGE will be on hand, selling rings and chains, brooches and sunnies and all KINDS of accessories from a crazy 50p! Ring on each finger?? WHY NOT! 

4) WE REPLENISH! Early bird got the worm? I don't think so! Although it's ALWAYS good to come for kick-off, we'll be replenishing stock ALL DAY to make sure there are plenty of treasures about. 

One final thing to get you going? Because everyone likes an offer, we're thrilled to say that IF YOU BUY 10 KILOS OR MORE, THE PRICE DROPS FROM £15 A KILO TO £10 A KILO! If that's not madness, we don't know what is!

And there we have it folks - ample reasons to practically CAMP outside and wait for the goodies [not really. Well, you can if you want!]

For any TRADERS wanting to come and shop for your business, email judy@judysvintagefair.co.uk and request your trade forms.

That's all folks - remember, we aren't small fry. This is going to be BIG!

Retro Regards,

771680519518581.description:
Cand se desfasoara LONDON CUP?
LONDON CUP se desfasoara Sambata 5 Aprilie - Ora 10:30. Inscrierea participantilor va avea loc cu 30 minute inainte de inceperea concursului direct in club si acestia pot beneficia de antrenament gratuit maxim 30 minute.

Cine poate participa? 
Participantii trebuie sa aiba varsta de peste 16 ani, sa nu se afle sub influenta alcoolului sau drogurilor si sa aiba un limbaj si comportament civilizat pe toata durata concursului. Ne rezervam dreptul de a selecta participantii.

Exista o taxa de participare?
Da. Participarea la concurs presupune achitarea unei taxe de 30 lei / persoana sau 20 lei /persoana pentru posesorii de card LONDON CLUB si minim 1 ora de biliard jucata pana la concurs. 

De asemenea participantii pot participa GRATUIT la concurs daca au jucat minim 6 ore de biliard in perioada dintre concursuri. Taxa de participare se va achita in ziua concursului, la inscrierea efectiva.

Se acorda premii?
Da. Se premiaza locurile 1 – 8 cu diplome, medalii, cupa si divese alte premii inedite. 


Poti beneficia GRATUIT de cardul de membru LONDON CLUB daca instalezi aplicatia pe smartphone: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ro.smartsetapp.londonclub

Aplicatia London CLub include:
- Prezentarea preturilor pentru jocurile de Biliard, Snooker si produsele de Bar
- Sistem de recompensare a clientilor fideli
- Posibilitatea de a ne trimite feedback
- Contact rapid
Fiecare utilizator al Aplicatiei London Club primeste reducere de 15% la jocurile de Biliard si Snooker, in baza Numarului de Card Loialitate care se primeste de la receptia Clubului.
Deasemenea, daca jucati cel putin doua ore de Biliard sau Snooker si scanati codul QR promotional din interiorul Clubului primiti o ora de Biliard gratis.Pentru a beneficia de aceasta promotie trebuie sa scanati codul QR de 5 ori. Scanarea codului se poate face la un interval de 12 ore.
Utilizatorii Aplicatiei pot primi mesaje de tip Push cu oferte promotionale care nu sunt accesibile celorlalti clienti. Acestea vor avea o frecventa de maxim un mesaj pe saptamana. Aditional, utilizatorii Aplicatiei pot primi mesaje de tip Push atunci cand se afla in apropierea London Club.

774789665884189.description:
Après un Week-end d'intégration, soirée d'intégration, Gala, Afterworks, Post-Exam et la Conférence, l'ECC Nancy te réserve une nouvelle surprise. 

Si cette année on n'est pas IN !
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
LES PRE-INSCRIPTIONS COMMENCENT DIMANCHE 16 FÉVRIER 2014 A 00H00.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Etape 1 : Remplir le Google Doc (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1_T4DJmDYVrZmfonqk7aMc_l2H3NmKqkFFGH8JdauBQY/viewform) qui fait office de pré-inscription. Suivant la date et l’heure à laquelle vous l’avez validé, vous êtes classés dans une file d’attente. Un mail sera envoyé sous 24h au 46 premières personnes. Ce dernier fera office de récapitulatif incluant notamment la somme due. 

A compter de la réception de ce mail, vous disposez de 7 jours pour payer le voyage (chèque ou espèces) ainsi que le chèque de caution (qui ne sera pas encaissé) au local de l’ECC situé en BR06. 
Une fois le paiement effectué, votre inscription est définitivement validée : Welcome to London !
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Modalités de désistement :  

Si désistement avant paiement, la personne sort de la liste des pré-inscrits et est remplacée par la première personne en attente.
Si désistement après paiement, nous remboursons à hauteur de 100% dans le cas où nous trouvons un remplaçant pour le voyage. Dans le cas contraire, seule la caution vous sera restituée. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Détails du voyage : 
  
Vendredi 21 / Samedi 22 / Dimanche 23 Mars 2014

DÉPART Vendredi 21 MARS 2014 : 6H45 Place Carnot - 54000 Nancy
Voyage en bus - Traversée via Ferry
ARRIVÉE Londres : fin d'après-midi 18h. 

HOTEL : Clink 261 - 261-265 Gray's Inn Road - London - U.K. 
Hôtel situé en centre ville, proche Camden Town. 

Chambres mixtes et privatisées pour l'ECC Nancy : 
Deux chambres de 8 personnes, 3 chambres de 6 personnes et 3 chambres de 4 personnes.

RETOUR Dimanche 23 Mars 2014 : 13H00 - Clink 261 - London- U.K. 
Voyage en bus - Traversée via Ferry
ARRIVÉE Nancy  : dans la nuit entre 23h et 00h. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Déroulement du weekend : 

Afin de vous garantir le meilleur des weekend, nous vous offrons la liberté maximale. Ainsi, l’intégralité du séjour excepté le samedi matin, est en quartier libre. Nous vous demandons juste de dormir chaque nuit à l’hôtel Clink 261. 
Une visite pédagogique est prévue le samedi matin, transport et visite pris en charge par l’ECC Nancy. 

Repas :  petit déjeuner anglais et continental à volonté inclus pour samedi et dimanche matin. 
Repas autres :  à votre charge. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Prix : 

Prix adhérent ECC uniquement pour l’année universitaire 2013-2014 : 125 euros 
Prix non adhérent ECC : 135 euros (5€ de cotisation ECC et 5€ de majoration) Toute personne n'étant pas adhérente ECC et payant son voyage devient automatiquement adhérent ECC. 
Caution 50 euros chèque uniquement (non encaissé).
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Conseils de voyage :  

Nous vous conseillons de prévoir de l’argent dans la devise anglaise (GBP) afin de vous éviter des frais de transaction éventuels lors de paiements et de retraits sur place.
Nous vous conseillons de vous munir de votre carte d’assurance maladie européenne gratuite délivrée par la MGEL ou MDE sous 2-3 semaines, afin de simplifier les éventuelles démarches en cas d’accident. 
Nous vous conseillons de voyager léger. Pour les groupes se connaissant à l’avance, répartissez les effets pouvant être partagés (sèche-cheveux, lisseur, etc.)

Pour les personnes nécessitant un traitement médical, ne pas oublier vos médicaments. A savoir que l’organisation ne pourra pas vous en fournir, même pour un mal de tête. 
Attention : 45 min de ferry, pour les personnes ayant le mal de mer ou le mal des transports en commun prévoyez des médicaments. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Responsabilités : 

L’ECC Nancy décline toute responsabilité en cas de perte, vol et casse lors du weekend « Trip to London ». En cas d’incidents pouvant entraîner des dommages corporels ou la mort l’ECC Nancy ne peut pas être tenue responsable. 

Pour toutes questions ou autres informations, contactez nous à l'adresse suivante : eccvoyage@gmail.com !
774789665884189.name: ECC TRIP TO LONDON

776364022375307.description:
This Saturday we are joined by one of our brand new residents, DJ Rockit Riyad! Set to be another capacity night. 

- The Venue -
Dimension Interiors have expertly created an edgy venue that draws inspiration from London's cultural and creative diversity. Neon signs mix with tattoo artwork alongside graffiti murals, rustic furniture and pornography plastered toilets. An East End Club in the heart of the West End, LEVEL 5 is open daily from from 10pm - 3am and offers the best in music, food and drink under one very unique roof.

- The Night -
The music policy is open format, peppered with tracks from many genres. London's best DJ's on rotation provide a soundtrack offering a real mix of rock and roll, house, urban and classic dance floor fillers. The music and decor set the backdrop for one unique nightclub experience. Champagne quaffing Sloaneys mingle with East end Shoreditch hipsters, while Soho's taboo breakers show London tourists how to party. Celebrity patrons have included Keith Lemon, Emma Bunton, McBusted, Arabella Drummond, Jimmy Q, and more.

- The Alcohol -
An extensive cocktail list is available, with a wide selection of premium spirits on offer. The bottle menu offers al of the usual bottled spirits in various sizes. A wide range of Champagnes are on offer too, topped with a sparkler for the attention seekers!

- Guestlist & Table Bookings -
Ladies enjoy complimentary entry before 11pm. Early arrival strongly recommended to allow for any queueing delays. Advance bookings are strongly recommended and provide queue jump privilege. A number of table booking options and birthday packages available. For Guestlist & Table reservations visit www.level5london.com

For Guestlist, Table Bookings:

777255285627439.description:
LONDON DRINK nasce a Gravina in Puglia dall'idea di due amici, Pasquale&Alfio, che hanno deciso di ricostruire insieme un pezzo della metropoli londinese nella propria città proponendo una concezione internazionale del Food+Drink.
Un cocktail di creatività, socializzazione, passione e esperienza nel settore, per evadere dai tradizionali schemi, proponendo deliziosi happy hour finger food, accompagnati da un'ampia scelta di Drink Internazionali, Birre Artigianali e musica dal vivo. 


Ore 20.30: Inizio Aperitivo offerto da Pasquale&Alfio e concerto LIve dei The Moondogs - Beatles Cover Band.
Definiti da RDS come la band più fortemente ispirata ai Beatles, i Moondogs sono l'unica cover band beatlesiana ad aver avuto l'onore di suonare nel più importante jazz club d'Italia, il BLUE NOTE. 
Pugliesi con alle spalle più di 500 concerti, in attività già dal lontano 2005, i Moondogs eseguiranno i brani più famosi dei Fab Four, dal 1962 al 1970, da Love Me Do a Let It Be, in tonalità originale, con strumenti d'epoca e con abiti simili ai modelli del quartetto di Liverpool. 

Ore 23.00: Selezione musicale a cura di Michelangelo Angiulli accompagnato da Mirko Palmieri al violino.

*gadgets e tante sorprese durante la serata@https://www.facebook.com/londondrinkfingerfood
777255285627439.name: INAUGURAZIONE "LONDON DRINK"

778185652200037.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://cityoflondonmhw2.eventbrite.com/?aff=efbevent

Join us on Bank Holiday Monday for the Muslim History Walk of City of London. The prefect opportunity for a fun day out with your children and to meet other people!

Did you know that Saladhuddin has connections with the City of London? Find out what they are whilst we show you some of the earliest Muslim Statues in UK, hidden gems, Architecture, Crime, Crusades/ Jihad, the place where humans were experimented on when medicine was brought over, Drink, The Great Fire of London, legends and much more!

Testimonies:

 

"Thoroughly enjoyed both walks - well researched, relaxed, insightful and a great eye opener to London's hidden Muslim history. The guide was impeccably professional (even in rain!) and knowledgeable and I would highly recommend both walks."

 

Lawyer, City of London.




 

"I thought it was an excellent and extremely interesting discussion- I learned so much!  I even asked me husband about St. George...  I think there should be more efforts to have these interesting pieces of history taught to more and more school children.  Young Muslim children should feel pride in their legacy in the UK, and other non-Muslims need to acknowledge the important contributions Muslims have been making to this country for centuries.
 

 

 

 All that said, it’s amazing how many people think that immigration and issues associated with it are new.  What I learned yesterday is that we have all been moving around and living together for our entire existence, and we are better for it.  Thank you for such a great afternoon and thank you for making me feel welcome" 
 



 

J. Martin, US Embassy, Cultural Attache`



"It was excellent mashallah, hihghly recommend to all. The evening was very informative. Provided a great insight in a practical fun 'walk n talk', which was sociable, giving a chance to meet new people and scope for photography along the way!"


Rooful Ali -Review of EMERALD
778185652200037.name: City of London Muslim History Walking Tour

789845804367794.description:
Systrar och bröder, vi tänkte bjuda med er på ett rymdäventyr! Efter månader av planering och byggande är rymdfarkosten redo att lyfta i april!

Våra ingenjörer och designers utlovar en magiskt inredd rymdfarkost med grymt ljud- och ljussystem. Ärade gäster och kompositörer från Stockholm gör oss sällskap på färden och bjuder på en väl avvägd mix av ljuva och ösiga toner, från deep house till techno.

Lite mer information om våra ärade gäster:

Efter 12 år i London har producenten och DJ:n Johan Lundin, likt en efterlängtad hjälte, återvänt till hemlandet, och vi har tillsammans med er äran att ha honom som gäst 11:e april. Johan var i London delaktig i ett musikkollektiv som byggde upp en hype i östra London med technopartyn, och blev sedan resident på klubben Detour London. Johans produktioner och DJ-set varierar mellan house och techno och är präglade med djup och känsla.

https://soundcloud.com/pulce
http://www.beatport.com/artist/johan-lundin/302309

Vi ska vara ärliga. Vi vet knappt vem Jenny Persson är. Det vi vet är att hennes mixar lät för jävla bra när vi på SoundCloud hittade henne av en slump, och att hon är från Stockholm. Detta är en bokning baserad på ren och skär musikalisk kvalitet. Vi ser fram emot att höra denna mystiska kvinna från öst spela den 11:e april och lära känna henne mer då.

https://soundcloud.com/jennypersson
Intervju: http://sajbc.com/2014/02/28/mini-intervju-23-jenny-persson/

Biljettpris: en hundring inklusive garderob. Ta gärna med cash för snabbare köflöde, så vi kan lyfta så snart som möjligt!

Vi ser fram emot att än en gång tillsammans med er njuta av en magisk afton i äventyrets tecken.

Välkommen!

/Zättigung-gänget.
789845804367794.name: Klubb Zättigung: Rymdäventyr med Johan Lundin (Detour London) och Jenny Persson (STHLM)

795207560508338.description:
London Calling is back, alive & kicking for 2014.

In contrast to last year, this year we will host London Calling events once a month, at the end of every month but with a little more going on than you’re used to!
Expect an eclectic mix of live performances from a selection of great local artists, as always, supported by our outstanding house band and this year with a few extra additions to the stage, to continue our unrivalled success of top quality entertainment and music.

Last year London Calling @ Pure Sky Club was reviewed and widely acclaimed as a fantastic new addition to Warsaw night life. Want to know more about London Calling, read below some statements accredited to us:

Talk of the town since launching over summer are Pure’s “London Calling” Friday nights.
If the concept sounds simple, the execution isn’t. This is a well-considered operation, with the entertainment brought to you by the organizers of Żurawina’s cult “Live Monday’s.” Yes, expect live music, and yes, expect jaunty themes to add an extra sprinkling of fizz!

Guests are ushered into a luxurious environment that’s upmarket but never overwhelming – it’s not splashy, gold-plated oligarch, more discreet and elegant. It’s definitely more London than new money Moscow.

The audience is diverse, more democratic. All nationalities gather, with the age ranges spanning the late 20s to the 50s. In short, no-one feels left out.

By 11 p.m. the place was jumping with a veritable roll-call of familiar faces old and new: anticipate lots of boozy back slaps as you reacquaint yourself with people you haven’t seen for many a month (years, even). And that, to me, is their greatest success – London Calling might still be in its infancy, but it’s already created something rare… a sense of community. It’s as much about the people as it is about the music”
[Review: Warsaw Insider October 2013]

London Calling – “The People Make The Party”
We welcome advanced bookings, table bookings for dining, events, birthday parties – you name the occasion, we will accommodate you, London Calling – Pure Sky Club.

Live music from 21:00
Please book a table in advance: info@pureskyclub.com
795207560508338.name: "London Calling" 28th March 2014

798555270173946.description:
**** LINE UP HAS BEEN ANNOUNCED ****
Check out the Artists performing on the night for this iconic event: Charlie Sloth, DJ Spoony, Steve Sutherland, Luck'n'Neat, Artful Dodger, Matt Jam Lamont, Hanif, DJ Ace, Matt White, Sammy Confunktion, DJ Skinz, Stamina, Ronnie Herel, Jigs, Gordon Mac, Mistri, Calvin Francis, Stretch Taylor, JM, Creed, DT, CKP, Ibz, Dr Psycho DJ Michael Jay and DJ Jonezy... 

After 40 years of running prolific club nights (since 1974), we will be saying goodbye to the iconic Club Colosseum, but before they close their doors for the final time, TwiceasNice will be hosting Club Colosseum’s last ever event on Sunday 27th April 2014, in association with Mi Soul.

Club Colosseum offers 5 Lavish Rooms, 5 Bars, 4 Dancefloors and 4 DJ Booths with a distinctive style and atmosphere providing the ideal background for a night with party goers who share your love of the music in the Colosseum’s elegant location overlooking the river in London’s Vauxhall.

When thinking of Club Colosseum’s Sunday nights, you can’t not think of TwiceasNice. Having held memorable events which saw the likes of Wesley Snipes, Idris Elba, Craig David, Rio Ferdinand, Lennox Lewis, Ian Wright and Grand Master Flash and many many more passing through its doors, TwiceasNice became the first night club to successfully amalgamate two of the most contemporary dance trends under one roof, changing the attitudes of UK Club Culture... The concept of a Sunday based club scene was something that very few people thought was even a remote possibility. TwiceasNice not only has made this dream a reality, but is seen as “the nucleus that has helped this scene blossom into a self sustaining industry” (DJ Magazine). With 20 years experience, we are one of Europe’s most recognised and respected entertainment brands, DJ Magazine has described us as “the legendary TwiceasNice – Number one in the Top Ten nights in the land”.

Join TwiceasNice and Mi Soul for Club Colosseum’s LAST EVER event… a night that will mark the end of an era for one of the most legendary clubs in London... TwiceasNice will be hosting a night of entertainment, filled with only the very best in music!

Don’t miss out on this iconic event – book your tickets now! (And don't forget to book the Monday off)

German DJ Barnt’s debut EP "What Is A Number, That A Man May Know It?"on Magazine became an instant Modern Kosmische classic in 2010, supported by Daphni, Four Tet, Dixon, Optimo, Tale Of Us et al. 809566929057741.description:
The Ministry Of Wolves + support from Alexander Teller

Alexander Hacke, Mick Harvey, Danielle de Picciotto, and Paul Wallfisch have collaborated – for the first time – as The Ministry Of Wolves. The album ‘Music From Republik der Wölfe’ is released on 17 February 2014. Based on the writings of the Brothers Grimm, in particular Anne Sexton’s ‘Transformations’ (1971), the Pulitzer Prize winning poet’s reworking of the Grimm’s fairy tales, the album has been created as a soundtrack to ‘Republik der Wölfe’ a theatre production directed by Claudia Bauer.
 
In the hands of Alexander Hacke (Einstürzende Neubauten/Crime & The City Solution), Mick Harvey (co-founder of Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds), Danielle de Picciotto (co-founder of Germany’s ‘Love Parade‘ and more recently, member of Crime & The City Solution) and Paul Wallfisch (Botanica, Firewater; musical director at the Theater Dortmund), these morality tales and warnings are as dark as you remember them from childhood, and, as can be heard here in ‘Rumpelstiltskin’ expose the characters as more human than they first seem, showing an aspect of ourselves we might prefer to ignore: “He is a monster of despair. He is all decay.”

plus support from Alexander Teller

https://www.facebook.com/tellermusic

18+ event
809566929057741.name: The Ministry Of Wolves @ The Lexington, London
